programme.title: Will & Grace
programme.desc: Will's boss invites him to dinner so she can decide whether he deserves to be made a partner in the firm, but he is reluctant to bring Vince as his date. Karen refuses to believe Rosario when she claims to be feeling ill. Lily Tomlin guest stars, with Eric McCormack and Megan Mullally.(n)

programme.title: Everybody Loves Raymond
programme.desc: Part two of two. The Barones continue reminiscing about their courtship and wedding, recalling Ray's marriage proposal and the subsequent uncertainty over Debra's motive for accepting. Afraid she may have felt pressured, he decides to give her a second opportunity to reject him.(n)

programme.title: Everybody Loves Raymond
programme.desc: The Barones are forced to stay with Ray's parents while their home is fumigated, providing Debra with the perfect opportunity to turn the tables by interfering in Frank and Marie's lives. Comedy, starring Ray Romano and Patricia Heaton.(n)

programme.title: Frasier
programme.desc: The family prepares to mourn a relative's death, and while Frasier and Niles organise the funeral in their usual hopeless style, Martin tries to finish a song he began writing for Frank Sinatra. Comedy, starring Kelsey Grammer.(n)

programme.title: Frasier
programme.desc: Kate encourages Bulldog to continue his audience-grabbing practical jokes against Frasier, who decides to exact a suitable revenge - blissfully unaware that such pranks have a nasty habit of backfiring. Comedy, starring Kelsey Grammer and Dan Butler.(n)

programme.title: Frasier
programme.desc: The shrink is up for a prestigious title at his wine club and offers to host the next tasting in his apartment. Determined to get everything just right, he hires contractors to fix a scratch on the floor - then watches in horror as they wreck the place. Comedy, starring Kelsey Grammer.(n)

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: Leonard and Amy are forced to take an unexpected road trip to Arizona to pick up Sheldon after his epic railway journey ends in chaos. Meanwhile, Howard finds Stuart's relationship with his mother strange, and Penny has an interview for a sales job at Bernadette's workplace. Comedy, starring Johnny Galecki, Jim Parsons and Kaley Cuoco.(n)

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: Sheldon is forced to teach a course at the university, and Howard surprises the gang when he decides to enrol on it. Meanwhile, Amy plays Penny and Bernadette off against each other while the tension brews over Penny's new job. Comedy, guest starring Regina King (Southland), with Johnny Galecki, Jim Parsons and Kaley Cuoco.(n)

programme.title: The Simpsons
programme.desc: Marge begins a crusade to clean up TV, convinced The Itchy & Scratchy Show is turning baby Maggie into a thug. The show's creators agree to make it less violent in future, but the move has a disastrous effect on its ratings.(n)

programme.title: The Simpsons
programme.desc: Bart pulls out all the stops to pass a school exam, determined to avoid the humiliating prospect of being held back a year - but finds he is not cut out for a life of constant study.(n)

programme.title: Channel 4 News Summary
programme.desc: Includes news headlines, sport and weather.(n)

programme.title: Couples Come Dine with Me
programme.desc: Three couples in north Somerset show off their culinary and hosting skills, Norman and Dee kick things off with an Indian menu that proves too spicy for their guests, followed by young lovebirds Ashley and Sophie - although Ashley lets the side down with an un-ironed shirt. Finally, self-styled funnyman Brett and his wife Vicky end the week with an American menu.(n)

programme.title: Posh Pawn
programme.desc: High-end pawnbroker James Constantinou faces rare items that are allegedly from Arctic explorer Ernest Shackleton's expeditions and values some vintage Chanel handbags. He also discovers a problem when he takes assistant Jo out for a terrifying test drive in a client's Porsche.(n)

programme.title: Countdown
programme.desc: Nick Hewer and Rachel Riley present the long-running words-and-numbers game as naturalist and broadcaster Kate Humble joins Susie Dent in Dictionary Corner.(n)

programme.title: The Question Jury
programme.desc: Seven new contestants have to work together to win up to £10,000, but one of the jurors starts to rub everyone up the wrong way.(n)

programme.title: A Place in the Sun: Summer Sun
programme.desc: Laura Hamilton shows a number of properties to Mena and Bal Patel, who want to buy a holiday home in Orihuela on the Costa Blanca in Spain.(n)

programme.title: Four in a Bed
programme.desc: The competition kicks off at the Cholmeley Arms in Burton-le-Coggles, Lincolnshire, where chef John Berry and his wife Lesley hold a sausage-making competition for their guests.(n)

programme.title: Come Dine with Me
programme.desc: DJ Trishna hosts the first of week of dinner parties in Cardiff, hoping her hip-hop-themed night impresses guests Yuno, Nick, Michelle and Suzanne as she tries to win the £1,000.(n)

programme.title: The Simpsons
programme.desc: The owner of the local comic-book shop suffers a heart attack, so Bart and Milhouse take his place behind the counter while he recuperates - and prove to have a real knack for commerce.(n)

programme.title: Hollyoaks
programme.desc: Cindy is alarmed over news of Armstrong, and Dirk has a plan. Zack feels under pressure, while Hunter and Neeta's day out is ruined. Meanwhile, Luke covers for Darren.(n)

programme.title: Channel 4 News
programme.desc: Including sport and weather.(n)

programme.title: Animal Rescue Live: Supervet Special
programme.desc: New series. Professor Noel Fitzpatrick, Steve Jones and Kate Quilton host an appeal running every night until Friday as they embark on a quest to rehome all the animals in Newcastle Dog & Cat Shelter, attempting to encourage people to consider them first over buying a pet. Many more rescue centres across the country are also taking part and the team will be helping would-be pet owners find their perfect playmate. In the first edition, singer Leona Lewis shares her love of giving shelter animals a second chance in life.(n)

programme.title: 999: What's Your Emergency
programme.desc: Following the criminalisation of formerly legal highs, crack and heroin use is on the up in Wiltshire - and some of the users seem to be getting younger and a routine stop and search uncovers a bag of crack cocaine in the possession of a boy still in his teens. Meanwhile, PC Luke Hobbs leads his first drugs raid on a suspected heroin and crack supplier in Swindon's city centre, discovering the property has been commandeered by a dealer from London who is using the address as a base to make a move into the local market.(n)

programme.title: Eden
programme.desc: New series. In March 2016, 23 men and women left everyday life behind to live in a remote part of the Highlands, where they would be given the chance to start again and create a new society from scratch. Their first months were shown on Channel 4 in 2016 and this catch-up follows their remaining time in Eden, to find out how the dream turned into a nightmare as by the summer hunger was rife and divisions within the camp already becoming apparent as Anton and Raph separated themselves and continue building a winter camp in the woods.(n)

programme.title: 60 Days in Jail
programme.desc: All hell breaks loose in the Clark County Jail when two pod bosses threaten the safety of three of the participants in Sheriff Jamey Noel's programme.(n)

programme.title: Britain's Benefit Tenants
programme.desc: In South Yorkshire, two landlords rush to the scene of a police raid, where the occupant has turned their property into a large cannabis factory. Meanwhile, when the local council holds up their housing benefit claims in Doncaster, an agent decides to evict all of his 160 benefit tenants.(n)

programme.title: Ramsay's Kitchen Nightmares USA
programme.desc: Gordon Ramsay travels to Oceana, a restaurant in the heart of New Orleans, to try to change the fortunes of a business run by two quarrelling brothers. The chef soon discovers that the ingredients are of poor quality and could pose a health hazard, but he struggles to make his point with the owners without causing an even bigger conflict between them.(n)

programme.title: Old People's Home for 4 Year Olds
programme.desc: Ten four year olds are half way through an ambitious six-week experiment, as they share their classroom with 11 pensioners who all follow the same timetable in a nursery near Bristol. Has the energy and activities of the younger group had a measurable impact on the pensioners? Can this ambitious experiment transform the way Britain cares for its increasingly older population?.(n)

programme.title: The Supervet
programme.desc: Cavachon Stampy has been hit by a car and is in a critical condition, leaving owners Jim and his wife Karen facing a difficult dilemma - to take the chance and put their pet through painful surgery, or let him die. Golden retriever Dylan has a limp, and owner Stuart has driven seven hours from Preston to seek Noel Fitzpatrick's help. Meanwhile, Ginny from Chelsea arrives with her beloved dachshund Lilly-Belle, who has lost the use of her back legs.(n)

programme.title: Selling Houses with Amanda Lamb
programme.desc: The host helps three rival homeowners struggling to sell their properties in Milton Keynes, who are given £1,000 to make improvements before hoping to impress buyer Michelle. Hannah and Chris need to knock through their kitchen and transform their garden, while Paul and Becki are advised to alter their bedrooms, and Tim and Heather need to highlight the potential in their one bedroom bungalow.(n)

programme.title: Location, Location, Location
programme.desc: Kirstie Allsopp and Phil Spencer's latest mission takes them to Sussex, where they help to solve two different house-hunting problems. Ashlee Newton has been saving for nine years to buy her first home, and is looking for a period flat near the bars and restaurants of Brighton or Hove. Colin Amery and Robin Balance are getting ready to move in together for the first time, and want to find a property they can renovate from scratch - which means they are paying particular attention to architectural details.(n)

programme.title: Shipping Wars UK
programme.desc: Shahbaz wins the contract to transport a bronze statue worth £95,000 from Surrey to Hertfordshire, while Stu and Jemma ship five bespoke beach huts from Hampshire to Lancashire.(n)

programme.title: Countdown
programme.desc: Nick Hewer and Rachel Riley present the long-running words-and-numbers game as naturalist and broadcaster Kate Humble joins Susie Dent in Dictionary Corner.(n)

programme.title: Will & Grace
programme.desc: A client asks Grace to design his restaurant, but with one condition - she must first fire Karen. Jack takes Will out to dinner, and promises not to get distracted by the other diners - which becomes difficult when a famous actress enters. With guest stars Jeff Goldblum and Patti LuPone.(n)

programme.title: Will & Grace
programme.desc: Karen is showered with gifts by her old sparring partner Scott, but her mind is elsewhere. Meanwhile, Grace tries to ignore the passing of another uneventful Valentine's Day, but ends up falling for a greetings-card writer. American comedy, guest starring Jeff Goldblum and Edward Burns with Debra Messing and Megan Mullally.(n)

programme.title: Everybody Loves Raymond
programme.desc: Frank backs into Robert's patrol car, prompting Debra to ban him from driving the kids anywhere - and leaving Ray contemplating his dad's advancing years. American comedy, starring Ray Romano and Patricia Heaton.(n)

programme.title: Everybody Loves Raymond
programme.desc: Debra hires a babysitter - whose subsequent popularity with the children leaves her quietly seething with jealousy. To make matters worse, Marie feels insulted because she was not offered the job. Comedy, starring Patricia Heaton.(n)

programme.title: Frasier
programme.desc: Part one of two. A miserly pay rise for staff prompts Frasier to cross swords with station manager Kate, but a meeting between the two sees them engage in more than negotiations as emotions are put to the test. Comedy, guest starring Mercedes Ruehl.(n)

programme.title: Frasier
programme.sub-title: The Adventures of Bad Boy and Dirty Girl.
programme.desc: Part two of two. Kate and Frasier decide to take their relationship slowly, until their passion gets the better of them in the radio booth and their steamy encounter is broadcast over the airwaves - leaving the whole of Seattle trying to work out the identity of `dirty girl'. Comedy, guest starring Mercedes Ruehl, with Kelsey Grammer.(n)

programme.title: Frasier
programme.sub-title: The Last Time I Saw Maris.
programme.desc: Niles reaches the end of his tether with Maris, and decides to retaliate - but she turns the tables by throwing him out and asking for a divorce. Comedy, starring David Hyde Pierce and Kelsey Grammer.(n)

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: Leonard and Penny attempt to prove Sheldon wrong when he claims that he and Amy have a superior relationship. Meanwhile, Howard is nervous when Nasa asks him to throw the first pitch at a baseball game honouring National Space Day. Comedy, starring Johnny Galecki, Jim Parsons and Kaley Cuoco.(n)

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: Raj's girlfriend Emily (Laura Spencer) gives Penny the cold shoulder when she learns about his past. Meanwhile, the guys debate investing in Stuart's comic-book shop and becoming part owners of the business. Comedy, starring Johnny Galecki, Jim Parsons and Kaley Cuoco.(n)

programme.title: The Simpsons
programme.sub-title: One Fish, Two Fish, Blowfish, Blue Fish.
programme.desc: Homer eats a poisonous fish and fears he has only 24 hours to live. As the minutes tick by, he embarks on a frantic race to put his affairs in order and accomplish everything he ever wanted to do but never did. With the guest voices of Larry King and George Takei.(n)

programme.title: The Simpsons
programme.desc: Lisa joins Mensa and inspires the local intelligentsia to take over Springfield. Determined to build a better world, they decide to transform the town into a utopia - but go too far and cause a riot. With the guest voice of Stephen Hawking.(n)

They also attempt to rehouse a whole host of pets from other rescue centres around the UK.(n)

programme.title: Eden

programme.title: Naked Attraction
programme.desc: Anna Richardson presents the dating show in which two singletons choose their favourite from a line-up of potential dates who reveal themselves one body part at a time - in all their naked glory. First up is 22-year-old gym addict Sophie from Surrey, who is desperate to find a man who boasts a little banter. Next up is Dom, a 25-year-old wedding model from Bournemouth. He wants to find the perfect man to waltz him down the aisle and thinks people that can guarantee to do this are confident, daring and adventurous in their outlook.(n)

programme.title: Poppy Cat
programme.desc: The friends discover that a piece is missing from their new puzzle, but they get hopelessly lost when they set out for Jigsaw Castle to find it.(n)

He has left his passengers behind, but will they help the cops or hinder the course of the investigation? Jamie Theakston presents.(n)

programme.title: Make or Break
programme.desc: New series. Eight couples whose relationships have reached breaking point are whisked off to a tropical Mexican resort, where they will find out whether their current squeezes are really right for them. Expert-led behaviour workshops, challenges, and sex therapy sessions aim to give each participant a deeper understanding of themselves, and each other. However, on arriving at the resort, each couple's relationship is put `on a break', and they are forced to swap partners every 48 hours, meaning the temptation to play away might prove too much for some.(n)

Plus, singer Pete Burns talks about his addiction to plastic surgery and, in an archive interview, Dolly Parton discusses the reasons for her changing image.(n)

programme.desc: Featuring a `Top Ten Guide to Living in Benidorm on the Cheap', revealing that life as a budget expat is possible for almost any pocket, before catching up with some of the big characters from the season. Scouse singer Eddie, Essex campsite worker Dean and Wigan granny Maria explain where to find super-cheap digs, and how to turn a caravan into a home with all mod cons.(n)

programme.title: Get Your Tatts Out: Kavos Ink
programme.desc: Documentary following a tattoo parlour catering to British tourists on Greece's Kavos strip. A new artist joins the team, and a customer gets a Chinese symbol on her arm - only to realise afterwards that she has no idea what it means. Two friends make a visit to the tattoo parlour part of a drinking game, and a woman gets a tattoo of a map of Corfu, only to find Kavos has been drawn in the wrong place.(n)

programme.title: House Doctor

programme.title: Divine Designs
programme.desc: Paul Binski, Professor of the History of Medieval Art at Cambridge University, examines the Italianate frescoes at Chalgrove's 14th-century parish church in Oxfordshire. He then views more pre-Reformation treasures in Ranworth, Norfolk, where the church has a finely painted rood-screen and an altar dedicated to women.(n)

Crime drama, starring Mark Harmon and Cote de Pablo.(n)

Family drama, starring Alexandria DeBerry, C Thomas Howell, Lance Henriksen and Olivia Osteen.(n)

programme.desc: Round-up of the day's headlines from around the world.(n)

programme.desc: England v South Africa. Highlights of the fifth day's play in the final Test of the four-match series, which took place at Old Trafford in Manchester.(n)

programme.title: The Dog Rescuers with Alan Davies
programme.desc: Inspector Steph Law takes a fox terrier to the vet, who discovers it has suffered years of neglect. The owner of a pregnant staffie is unable to look after a litter of puppies while moving house, so inspector Herchy Boal sets up a makeshift maternity ward. Chef Lesley Waters prepares a meal for three dogs in Bath, while on Halloween, chief inspector Matt Gough is called out to rescue an abandoned puppy.(n)

programme.title: Celebrity Big Brother
programme.desc: Emma Willis presents the first live eviction show of the series. As usual, she presents yesterday's highlights before revealing which of the renowned residents will be leaving tonight and talking to her about being cooped up with their fellow famous faces.(n)

programme.title: Make or Break
programme.desc: David and Beth receive some helpful sex therapy, and Elle continues to struggle with cheating boyfriend Andy sharing a room with another girl. Meanwhile, Stephen's secret is exposed.(n)

programme.title: Celebrity Big Brother's Bit on the Side
programme.desc: Rylan Clark-Neal presents the CBB companion show, featuring gossip, chat and features from the house. Including a debate on the burning issues, celebrity guests' thoughts on the latest developments and behind-the-scenes insights.(n)

programme.title: Morgan
programme.desc: A mysterious artificial being evolves faster than anticipated, and a corporate consultant is enlisted to determine the test subject's fate(n)

programme.title: Midnight Cowboy
programme.desc: A young stud who is going nowhere fast in small-town Texas heads for New York in this classic downbeat drama which won an Oscar for best picture. On the sleazy streets of the Big Apple, Joe Buck's dreams of finding glamour and adventure are shattered by a succession of unsavoury incidents, but he finds a friend in the unlikely shape of Ratso Rizzo, a street hustler with a wasting lung disease(n)

programme.title: The Fly II
programme.desc: Martin Brundle, son of the late Brundlefly from the first chapter, is born under the watchful eye of Anton Bartok, an unscrupulous scientific tycoon, determined to discover the secret of the teleportation pods invented by Martin's father. As time goes by, and Martin begins to develop certain characteristics that mark him as abnormal, he begins to realize that his foster father's motives are less than honourable(n)

programme.title: Dirty Harry
programme.desc: Clint Eastwood stars in this energetic and influential story about a maverick cop's obsessive attempts to bring a cold-blooded serial killer to justice before he kills again(n)

programme.title: Sugar
programme.desc: Filmmakers Ryan Fleck and Anna Boden (Half Nelson) weave this introspective sports drama concerning a talented Dominican baseball player who longs to break into the American big league and earn the money needed to support his impoverished family. Miguel Santos is a talented pitcher who might just have what it takes to earn a prized spot on a Major League Baseball team, but before that happens he'll have to prove his worth in the minor leagues. Advancing into the United States' minor league system at the tender age of 19, Miguel is warmly welcomed into the small-town Iowa home of his host family, but can't help but struggle with language and cultural barriers despite the kindness of strangers. Subsequently forced to reevaluate his life's ambition after his once-trusty arm becomes unreliable, the previously single-minded pitcher gradually begins to question both the world he lives in and the role he has chosen to play in it(n)

programme.title: Mr. Right
programme.desc: In this offbeat love story, a woman falls for an oddly principled hit man who kills anyone who hires him to commit murder. While she believes she's finally found the perfect guy, their romance is threatened by an FBI agent who's hunting her new beau(n)

programme.title: Old School
programme.desc: Riotous campus comedy in which a lawyer unwittingly gives his thirty-something friends an opportunity to recapture their college years when he relocates to a local university. Having caught his wife cheating on him, the out-of-luck attorney finds his new house turning into a 24-hour party pad for a variety of misfit college students, middle-aged slackers and elderly retirees as he struggles to avoid being evicted by the new Dean of Students(n)

programme.title: Auto Focus
programme.desc: Greg Kinnear stars in this gritty true story about the rise and fall of a well-loved television actor whose life descends into a world of amateur porn and orgies. Bob Crane, the star of American sitcom Hogan's Heroes was a household name in the '60s but he lived a secret life that was scandalous even by Hollywood standards. This is the story of his life and the sordid events that may have led to his murder in 1978, a crime that's still officially unsolved. Also stars Willem Dafoe and Maria Bello(n)

programme.title: Redemption
programme.desc: An Afghanistan War veteran living in London seeks revenge against his pregnant girlfriend's killer by assuming an upper-class identity and using his connections in the Chinese mob(n)

programme.title: Reign Of Fire
programme.desc: Medieval fantasy meets futuristic science fiction in this effects-heavy action epic from former X-Files director Rob Bowman. In present-day London, 12-year-old Quinn Abercromby witnesses the awakening of a hibernating dragon from a centuries-long slumber, the result of a construction dig supervised by his mother and an incident for which Quinn feels partially responsible. Twenty years later, the adult Quinn is the fire chief of a refortified castle community, responsible for dousing the blazes lit by the dragon's prodigious number of flame-spewing offspring, airborne juggernauts that have wreaked havoc across the globe, torching civilization and turning humans into an endangered species. Hope arrives in the form of Denton "Dragon Slayer" Van Zan, an American known to be the only man to ever kill one of the dragons, and Alex Jenson, a scientist/pilot who's a member of Van Zan's army, a zealous fighting force that includes a secret weapon: the Archangels, paratroopers using themselves as bait to attract and then dispatch the deadly beasts(n)

programme.title: Ouija: Origin of Evil
programme.desc: In this horror sequel, a game of Ouija leads to supernatural activity. The youngest daughter of a widow is possessed by an evil spirit as the family goes through hell to try desperately to save her(n)

programme.title: The Omen
programme.desc: After his wife gives birth to a stillborn child, the American ambassador to Britain switches two kids in their hospital cribs. What he doesn't know is that little Damien is the Anti-Christ. Seminal 70s horror(n)

programme.title: As Above, So Below
programme.desc: A group of young people uncover a disturbing secret when they venture into the catacombs below Paris(n)

programme.title: Master Of The Drunken Fist: Beggar So
Auto Focus
programme.desc: Greg Kinnear stars in this gritty true story about the rise and fall of a well-loved television actor whose life descends into a world of amateur porn and orgies. Bob Crane, the star of American sitcom Hogan's Heroes was a household name in the '60s but he lived a secret life that was scandalous even by Hollywood standards. This is the story of his life and the sordid events that may have led to his murder in 1978, a crime that's still officially unsolved. Also stars Willem Dafoe and Maria Bello(n)

programme.title: The Darkness
programme.desc: During a family camping trip at the Grand Canyon, a young boy (David Mazouz) stumbles upon an ancient Native American burial ground. He takes five sacred stones from there back to his suburban home, unaware that they contain a malevolent supernatural force. This tale of terror was directed by Wolf Creek's Greg McLean. Kevin Bacon, Radha Mitchell, and Lucy Fry star in a Blumhouse Productions film(n)

programme.title: Stir of Echoes
programme.desc: Tom Witzky is a regular guy whose life is turned upside down after he is hypnotised by his sister-in-law. Suddenly, his ordinary life is invaded with violent flashes of horrific images he cannot explain(n)

programme.title: Species
programme.desc: A lab-created human/alien hybrid goes on a killing spree while searching for a man who can impregnate her. Meanwhile, the scientist responsible for her creation brings together a motley crew in order to stop her(n)

programme.title: The Cotton Club
programme.desc: In 1920s New York, gangsters rub shoulders with celebrities at Harlem's Cotton Club. A jazz musician falls for a mobster's moll and a black dancer pursues a mixed race chorus girl, but racial and legal divides keep them apart(n)

programme.title: Dead Poets Society
programme.desc: A staid but well-respected prep school is enlivened by a newly-arrived, charismatic English teacher, who inspires his students with unconventional methods and philosophies(n)

programme.title: Glory Road
programme.desc: Basketball coach Dan Haskins recruits a team of predominantly black players to play for his team in racially segregated and football-mad Texas. They must overcome the many challenges that face them if they are to prove victorious against Division I favourites Kentucky(n)

programme.title: My Cousin Vinny
programme.desc: When his young cousin is inadvertently charged with murder in an Alabama town, an untested Brooklyn lawyer takes on his first case as he attempts to defend two penniless youths in the heart of Dixie, where he clearly does not understand the protocols of the courtroom...or the South(n)

programme.title: Ted 2
programme.desc: With the help of his best friend John, a sentient teddy bear named Ted fights to be legally recognized as a human so he can have a child with his new wife Tami-Lynn. This gut-busting comedy is a sequel to the 2012 surprise hit(n)

programme.title: Risky Business
programme.desc: A Chicago teenager is looking for fun at home while his parents are away, but the situation quickly gets out of hand(n)

programme.title: Miss March
programme.desc: A young man tries to reconnect with his long-ago sweetheart after he awakens from a four-year coma to discover she's become a men's-magazine centerfold(n)

programme.title: Ride Along 2
programme.desc: Friction continues between a rookie cop and his seasoned partner (who's also his future brother-in-law) in this sidesplitting action comedy. After discovering a mysterious flash drive during an arrest, the pair travel to Miami to hunt down a drug lord with the help of a savvy detective(n)

programme.title: The Maze Runner: The Scorch Trials
programme.desc: Thomas, Teresa, and the rest of the Gladers prepare for phase two of their maze trials after narrowly escaping the first test in this young-adult dystopian sequel(n)

programme.title: The Divergent Series: Allegiant
programme.desc: After discovering the truth about their walled city and breaking down its oppressive faction system, Tris and Four lead a journey outside of Chicago to learn more about who has been manipulating their civilization. But once their group comes face-to-face with the society that turned their city into an enclosed experiment, secrets are uncovered that threaten the fate of humankind(n)

programme.title: The Martian
programme.desc: A lone astronaut is left behind on the hostile surface of Mars after an exploratory mission goes awry, and must use his ingenuity to create a habitat where he can survive. Meanwhile, his crewmates and a team of scientists work to rescue him, in defiance of NASA protocol(n)

programme.title: Old School

Having caught his wife cheating on him, the out-of-luck attorney finds his new house turning into a 24-hour party pad for a variety of misfit college students, middle-aged slackers and elderly retirees as he struggles to avoid being evicted by the new Dean of Students(n)

programme.title: Auto Focus
programme.desc: Greg Kinnear stars in this gritty true story about the rise and fall of a well-loved television actor whose life descends into a world of amateur porn and orgies. Bob Crane, the star of American sitcom Hogan's Heroes was a household name in the '60s but he lived a secret life that was scandalous even by Hollywood standards. This is the story of his life and the sordid events that may have led to his murder in 1978, a crime that's still officially unsolved. Also stars Willem Dafoe and Maria Bello(n)

programme.title: Redemption
programme.desc: An Afghanistan War veteran living in London seeks revenge against his pregnant girlfriend's killer by assuming an upper-class identity and using his connections in the Chinese mob(n)

programme.title: Reign Of Fire
programme.desc: Medieval fantasy meets futuristic science fiction in this effects-heavy action epic from former X-Files director Rob Bowman. In present-day London, 12-year-old Quinn Abercromby witnesses the awakening of a hibernating dragon from a centuries-long slumber, the result of a construction dig supervised by his mother and an incident for which Quinn feels partially responsible. Twenty years later, the adult Quinn is the fire chief of a refortified castle community, responsible for dousing the blazes lit by the dragon's prodigious number of flame-spewing offspring, airborne juggernauts that have wreaked havoc across the globe, torching civilization and turning humans into an endangered species. Hope arrives in the form of Denton "Dragon Slayer" Van Zan, an American known to be the only man to ever kill one of the dragons, and Alex Jenson, a scientist/pilot who's a member of Van Zan's army, a zealous fighting force that includes a secret weapon: the Archangels, paratroopers using themselves as bait to attract and then dispatch the deadly beasts(n)

programme.title: Ouija: Origin of Evil
programme.desc: In this horror sequel, a game of Ouija leads to supernatural activity. The youngest daughter of a widow is possessed by an evil spirit as the family goes through hell to try desperately to save her(n)

programme.desc: The Beast With a Billion Backs. The creator of The Simpsons, Matt Groening, is responsible for this animated series. Set in the year 3000, the series follows Fry (voiced by Billy West), a 25- year-old New York pizza delivery boy who, after being accidentally cryogenically frozen, wakes up to a whole new world. The future he discovers has airborne freeways, rocket ships, talking heads in jars, dangerously addictive soft drinks and Stop 'n' Drop suicide booths. Fortunately he has on hand his friends Bender (voiced by John DiMaggio), a hard-drinking, cigar-smoking, pornography-reading robot, and Leela (voiced by Katey Sagal), a beautiful, one-eyed alien martial arts expert, to help him make sense of this new environment(n)

programme.channel: Crime and Investigation Network HDTV (CI HD)
programme.title: American Justice
programme.sub-title: Dead Woman Walking: The Karla Faye Tucker Story
programme.desc: Dead Woman Walking: The Karla Faye Tucker Story. This documentary, part of the American Justice series from A&E, examines the Texas death penalty case of Karla Faye Walker. Narrated by American Justice host and producer Bill Kurtis, this episode goes inside the investigation of the two murders that Walker and her boyfriend Daniel Ryan Garrett committed. The trial of Walker is shown through exclusive footage. After the conviction, American Justice follows her through her daily life, showing her prison surroundings and talking with her about her crimes. Sentenced to death, while Walker was waiting to be executed, she became a born-again Christian. Her lawyers used this transformation as leverage to try to get her death sentence reduced to life in prison. Their attempts were unsuccessful and Walker was killed by lethal injection in February 1998. American Justice also shows interviews with lawyers and law enforcement professionals who knew Walker(n)

programme.desc: Camera crews follow the activities of wildlife in the Arctic and Antarctic, including an emperor penguin colony's nine-month migration across sea ice to its breeding ground. programme.title: Volcano Hell
programme.desc: In 1985 an eruption in Colombia killed 20,000 people asleep in the town below, leaving the scientific community horrified that they were unable to avert this tragedy by foreseeing extreme volcanic activity in the region. The programme follows the subsequent quest of two researchers to find a method of prediction, and reveals how years later, when they thought they had achieved their goal, they clashed over one volcano - leading to the shattering of reputations, but also the solving of the problem once and for all.(n)

programme.title: Oceans
programme.desc: An insight into the largely unexplored Southern Red Sea, which is teeming with marine life and home to some of the warmest waters on the planet.(n)

programme.title: Dino Hunt
programme.desc: Scientists in Alberta look for the skeleton of a rare horned dinosaur, while in Saskatchewan a team find the fossils of the last dinosaurs to walk the Earth.(n)

programme.title: Deadly 60
programme.desc: Steve's search for deadly animals takes him and the crew to South Africa to observe the great white shark, where he gets some fantastic views of the `king of the ocean' - and to demonstrate the team's hunting prowess, he has a special trick up his sleeve. Just as feared by many is the Cape Buffalo, known locally as the black-death. The presenter takes to the skies to track down a huge herd of this notoriously bad tempered bovine beast, before being charmed by the snake-stomping secretary bird.(n)

programme.title: Deadly 60
programme.desc: Wildlife expert Steve Backshall heads for Australia, encountering one of the country's deadliest snakes in Perth, diving with bottlenose dolphins and discovering the method used by pelicans to catch their supper.(n)

programme.title: Planet Earth
programme.desc: The wildlife on the great plains of Africa, Asia, North America and the Arctic, which cover a quarter of the land on Earth. The distinctive Tibetan fox is captured on film for the first time, while a herd of caribou migrates 2,000 miles across the tundra in search of grass. Night vision equipment tracks a pride of 30 lions hunting elephants in the tropical African savannah near one of the region's few remaining waterholes. Presented by David Attenborough.(n)

programme.title: Deadliest Tornados
programme.desc: Documentary examining the 2011 tornado season in America, which left a trail of destruction across the country and resulted in more than 550 deaths. Scientists are witnessed analysing the forces at work behind the outbreak, hoping their work could improve tornado prediction in the future. The programme also meets some of the people whose lives were upended by the storms and explains the preventative measures that can be taken to minimise the impact of such extreme weather events.(n)

programme.title: Thirteen Days
programme.desc: Kevin Costner stars in this thrilling and beautifully acted political drama about the Cuban Missile Crisis. Set in October 1962, the film chronicles how President Kennedy's bickering, backbiting staff tried to avert a nuclear war with the Soviet Union. Bruce Greenwood stars as JFK. Steven Culp, Dylan Baker, Henry Strozier(n)

programme.desc: Spike Jonze's imaginative black comedy about a frustrated puppeteer (John Cusack) who gains access to John Malkovich's brain via a small portal in his office(n)

programme.title: Never Say Never Again

programme.desc: Secret agent James Bond travels around the world searching for criminal mastermind Ernst Blofeld, and finds an unexpected ally in a troubled young Contessa whom 007 considers marrying(n)

programme.title: Being John Malkovich
programme.desc: Spike Jonze's imaginative black comedy about a frustrated puppeteer (John Cusack) who gains access to John Malkovich's brain via a small portal in his office(n)

programme.title: Planet of the Apes
programme.desc: Crashing on an unknown planet in the year 2029, astronaut Leo Davidson is caught up in a savage society where apes keep human slaves(n)

programme.title: Leviathan
programme.desc: In George Cosmatos' sci-fi thriller, a team of oceanographers discovers a sunken Soviet submarine housing the murderous product of a genetic experiment gone horribly wrong(n)

programme.title: Never Say Never Again
programme.desc: Essentially, this film is a remake of the 1965 Bond flick Thunderball. James Bond emerges from cozy retirement to cross swords with Largo, a megalomaniacal business exec who steals several nuclear missiles, intending to bring the World Powers to their knees(n)

programme.title: Survivor's Remorse
programme.desc: Grown-Ass Man. As Season 2 tips off, the Calloways have moved from the penthouse to a regal new mansion, and Cam's new contract and its serious clauses ties him tightly to owner Jimmy Flaherty, who wants to maximise Cam's time(n)

programme.title: Survivor's Remorse
programme.desc: A Time to Punch. Cam and M-Chuck are taken by surprise by some media fallout and a DA's scrutiny about domestic abuse, while Uncle Julius squares off with a neighbour whose dog dumps things in the driveway(n)

programme.title: Patriot Games
programme.desc: Harrison Ford plays ex-CIA agent Jack Ryan who, on a visit to London with his family, foils the assassination of a government minister by the IRA, killing one of the attackers in the process. Swearing vengeance, IRA man Sean Miller follows Ryan and his family to their seaside home in America, where he and his followers plan to exact their revenge. Based on Tom Clancy's novel, directed by Phillip Noyce(n)

programme.title: Truth
programme.desc: Docudrama about the controversial 2004 "60 Minutes" exposé on US President George W Bush's military service, and the fallout that producer Mary Mapes and anchor Dan Rather suffered after questions were raised about the validity of key documents in the report(n)

programme.title: Baby Boom
programme.desc: When a professional woman with a high-profile job "inherits" a 14-month-old baby girl from recently deceased relatives, she intends to put her up for adoption, but she discovers that she likes the kid and motherhood. So life begins to go through some massive changes(n)

programme.title: Ricki and the Flash
programme.desc: Ricki is an aging rock-n'roll-loving woman who abandoned her family in order to chase her tattered dream of becoming a famous rock star. Now, she is given one last chance to set things right when her ex-husband, Pete, asks her to visit her estranged daughter, Julie, in Chicago(n)

Based on Tom Clancy's novel, directed by Phillip Noyce(n)

programme.title: Best Laid Plans
programme.desc: When Nick gets into trouble with local drug dealers, he creates an elaborate plan to make some fast cash. Nick and his girlfriend Lissa target an old college friend . When Witherspoon puts the plan in action and accuses Brolin of rape, Brolin ties her up and leaves her in the basement in this double-crossing drama(n)

programme.title: Thank You for Smoking
programme.desc: Aaron Eckhart lights up the screen in this hilarious satire about a gleefully amoral tobacco industry lobbyist who stops at nothing to put a positive spin on smoking as he clashes with a senator (William H. Macy), who wants to snuff out cigarettes. Maria Bello, Adam Brody, Sam Elliott, Katie Holmes, Rob Lowe. Directed by Jason Reitman(n)

programme.desc: M.V.P. Cassie gets back in the dating pool and is determined to have things her way, which has a financial impact on Cam; and Reggie meets the eccentric genius who made Flaherty rich(n)

programme.title: Survivor's Remorse
programme.desc: Homebound. Cam feels the pressure on his first game back in Boston, while on a cultural tour of a plantation, M-Chuck delves into ongoing racial tensions(n)

programme.title: Philadelphia

programme.title: Reservoir Dogs
programme.desc: Brutal Tarantino masterpiece. An all-star cast dazzle as members of a crime syndicate who take grizzly revenge on the police informer who blows the whistle on their heist(n)

programme.title: The Devil's Own
programme.desc: Controversial thriller about an Irish-American cop who wrestles with his conscience when he learns that his new lodger is an undercover IRA operative on a mission to buy weapons(n)

programme.title: Quarantine
programme.desc: A news reporter and her cameraman are assigned to spend an evening shift with the Los Angeles fire service, when a routine call takes them to an incident in an apartment block. Once there they hear blood-curdling screams which lead them to a rabid woman, but on trying to escape they find the building has been sealed and they are now quarantined with a host of murderous infected tenants(n)

programme.title: The Glass Shield
programme.desc: Police thriller about a pair of rookie cops who find themselves victims of corruption within their own force. The first black officer in the sheriff's department struggles against the racially hostile attitudes of the other officers, but finds an ally in the only female member of the department. When their colleagues accuse an innocent man of murder, the precinct's two outsiders have to question their loyalties carefully(n)

programme.title: Underdog
programme.desc: Live-action children's adventure about a canine superhero. A dog is bestowed with special powers in a lab experiment gone wrong. He and his teenage owner then set out to protect their city from the diabolical plans of a mad megalomaniac doctor(n)

programme.desc: An ex-marine special forces commander hunts down a crew of diamond thieves who have abducted his wife(n)

programme.title: Monk
programme.sub-title: Mr Monk Goes to the Dentist.
programme.desc: Disher visits his dentist for emergency treatment, and witnesses a murder while under anaesthetic. Unfortunately, because he was semi-conscious at the time, Stottlemeyer refuses to believe him - so he quits the force and hires Adrian to solve the mystery. Guest starring Jon Favreau (Iron Man).(n)

programme.title: Monk
programme.sub-title: Mr Monk Meets Dale the Whale.
programme.desc: An obese tycoon who once sued Adrian's wife for libel is accused of murdering a judge. A 911 call and the testimony of a 10-year-old boy identify him as the culprit, but nobody knows how the 57st man - who has not left his bed for 11 years - could have got out of the house to commit the crime. Guest starring Adam Arkin (Sons of Anarchy).(n)

programme.title: Monk
programme.sub-title: Mr Monk Goes to the Carnival.
programme.desc: Stottlemeyer rules that Adrian is still not ready to rejoin the force - then adds insult to injury by asking him to prove the innocence of his friend, a police officer accused of murdering a fellow passenger while riding on a fairground Ferris wheel. Tony Shalhoub stars.(n)

programme.title: The Closer
programme.desc: Brenda's parents visit, and pressure her into setting a date for the wedding. However, she cannot resist helping the squad investigate a murder, despite the presence of her guests. Starring Kyra Sedgwick.(n)

programme.title: The Closer
programme.desc: The body of an obese man who stole diamonds from his own shop is discovered in the boot of a car - and the team suspects his illusionist girlfriend might be involved in his death. Starring Kyra Sedgwick.(n)

programme.title: NCIS
programme.desc: The notorious Tri-State Sniper appears to have claimed another victim when a petty officer is shot dead in a crowded park. However, when the team discovers the killer in question was already in custody on the day of the shooting, it becomes clear a copy-cat is on the loose. As their investigation progresses, the agents learn the victim was recently found guilty of placing a camera in the female changing rooms of the USS Camden, earning himself plenty of enemies - but did any of them hate him enough to kill?.(n)

programme.title: NCIS
programme.desc: The team is called to investigate the murder of a retired US Navy lieutenant commander, and the inquiry forces Ducky to reveal he has been working as part of a secret society dedicated to solving cold cases. Starring Mark Harmon, David McCallum and Pauley Perrette.(n)

programme.title: Monk
programme.sub-title: Mr Monk Goes to the Asylum.
programme.desc: The police find Adrian wandering round his dead wife Trudy's former home and have him admitted to a psychiatric hospital, where a fellow patient informs him of an unsolved murder dating from four years earlier - which he naturally sets out to solve.(n)

programme.title: Monk
programme.sub-title: Mr Monk and the Billionaire Mugger.
programme.desc: The shooting of a billionaire computer mogul during an attempted mugging intrigues the detective - especially once he discovers the attacker was another wealthy businessman. His investigation reveals the men involved knew each other and had come into conflict a few years earlier.(n)

programme.title: The Closer
programme.desc: A known sex offender is suspected of raping several women and murdering one in her home. His lawyer proves to be a match for Brenda, putting the team at risk of losing the case. Starring Kyra Sedgwick.(n)

programme.title: The Closer
programme.desc: Brenda's plans to organise her wedding are put on hold when a phone containing text messages pointing to a possible murder is found. Fritz's sister Claire, who fancies herself as a psychic, tags along and tries to help with the investigation. Kyra Sedgwick stars.(n)

programme.title: NCIS
programme.desc: DiNozzo is reunited with his old flame, Jeanne Benoit, when insurgents in Sudan attack a group of volunteer doctors, including her husband. Travelling to the crime scene to conduct a joint murder-kidnapping investigation, Dinozzi and McGee offer their assistance in searching for the missing doctors. Crime drama, starring Michael Weatherly and Sean Murray, with Scottie Thompson.(n)

programme.title: NCIS
programme.desc: Petty officer Kyle Friedgen is accused of killing his ex-girlfriend, but while his case is dismissed due to a mishandled warrant, his life and reputation are marred by suspicion that he got away with murder. Determined to clear his name in full, Friedgen volunteers to be court-martialled, on the condition that the NCIS team conducts its own investigation. Meanwhile, Bishop and Jake discuss their marital problems. Naval crime drama, starring Emily Wickersham, with Jamie Bamber.(n)

programme.title: False Flag
programme.desc: Shin Bet supervisor Ethan questions the four kidnapping suspects, discovering connections between Ben Raphael and Emma Lipman. However, Natalie Elfassia remains silent. In Hebrew.(n)

programme.title: Marvel's Agent Carter
programme.desc: Peggy closes in on Howard Stark's stolen technology, but her secret mission could unravel when the SSR arrests Jarvis and a secret is revealed. Spy drama, starring Hayley Atwell.(n)

programme.title: Family Guy
programme.sub-title: Be Careful What You Fish For.
programme.desc: Peter promises a favour to a helpful dolphin when he and his friends try to salvage a sunken car. However, the sea creature overstays his welcome in Quahog, prompting Peter to track down his estranged wife. With the guest voice of Ricky Gervais.(n)

programme.title: Family Guy
programme.desc: Mort enlists the help of Peter and Quagmire as he battles overwhelming financial troubles, but things take a turn for the worse when they decide to burn down his pharmacy for the insurance money.(n)

programme.title: American Dad
programme.desc: Stan finds out his half-brother Rusty (guest voice Lou Diamond Phillips) is wealthier than him when the family gathers for Thanksgiving, and takes extreme measures to recover what he thinks is rightfully his.(n)

programme.title: American Dad
programme.desc: Stan is awaiting his annual jury summons, but there is trouble ahead when becomes the foreman in a trial where Roger is the defendant. Meanwhile, Jeff and Hayley move in with the Smiths, and Francine tries to get Jeff to clean up his act.(n)

programme.title: Family Guy
programme.desc: Nobody seems to care when Brian accidentally runs over and kills a fellow dog, so he tries to convince his friends that they should value canine lives as much as those of humans. Meanwhile, Lois hires a maid who does not listen to Peter.(n)

programme.title: Family Guy
programme.desc: Carter has a heart attack and lapses into a deep coma, so Peter takes over the running of his company Pewterschmidt Industries, but becomes power-mad and ends up firing every member of the board of directors.(n)

programme.title: American Dad
programme.desc: Stan creates a clone of Steve, and takes the opportunity to challenge Francine to a parenting competition in which they each raise one of the teenagers to determine who has the better child-rearing skills. Meanwhile, Roger tries to find a missing bride and groom in Thailand.(n)

programme.title: American Dad
programme.sub-title: The Best Little Horror House in Langley Falls.
programme.desc: A battle between Stan and Buckle breaks out when they try to outdo each other with their Halloween decorations. Animated comedy, with the voices of Seth MacFarlane and Scott Grimes.(n)

programme.title: Family Guy
programme.desc: Lois takes drastic action to save the life of Stewie's new best friend after his parents refuse treatment for his illness due to their religious beliefs. Meanwhile, Peter has a spiritual experience of his own. With the guest voice of Judy Greer (Archer).(n)

programme.title: Family Guy
programme.sub-title: Tom Tucker: The Man and His Dream.
programme.desc: Peter becomes newsreader Tom Tucker's agent as he pursues his dream of becoming a famous actor, and Chris begins dating a girl who looks a lot like a member of the Griffin household.(n)

programme.title: American Dad
programme.desc: Stan is delighted when Roger offers to help him open a restaurant, but their differences of opinion wreak havoc. Elsewhere, Steve sees an opportunity for romance when the new girl at school invites him over while her parents are out of town.(n)

programme.title: American Dad
programme.desc: A marriage counsellor hypnotises Francine and unwittingly revives her long-held dreams of becoming a comedienne. Meanwhile, Steve brings home a potential love interest for Klaus.(n)

programme.title: Teleshopping
programme.desc: Buying goods from the comfort of home.(n)

programme.title: Monk
programme.desc: In a case with clear echoes of classic film 12 Angry Men, Adrian is summoned for jury duty - and manages to solve a murder while shut off from the outside world in a locked room. For good measure, he also thwarts a mobster planning to escape from police custody in the same building.(n)

programme.title: Monk
programme.sub-title: Mr Monk Goes to the Asylum.
programme.desc: The police find Adrian wandering round his dead wife Trudy's former home and have him admitted to a psychiatric hospital, where a fellow patient informs him of an unsolved murder dating from four years earlier - which he naturally sets out to solve.(n)

programme.title: Monk
programme.sub-title: Mr Monk and the Billionaire Mugger.
programme.desc: The shooting of a billionaire computer mogul during an attempted mugging intrigues the detective - especially once he discovers the attacker was another wealthy businessman. His investigation reveals the men involved knew each other and had come into conflict a few years earlier.(n)

programme.title: The Closer
programme.desc: A known sex offender is suspected of raping several women and murdering one in her home. His lawyer proves to be a match for Brenda, putting the team at risk of losing the case. Starring Kyra Sedgwick.(n)

programme.title: The Closer
programme.desc: Brenda's plans to organise her wedding are put on hold when a phone containing text messages pointing to a possible murder is found. Fritz's sister Claire, who fancies herself as a psychic, tags along and tries to help with the investigation. Kyra Sedgwick stars.(n)

programme.title: NCIS
programme.desc: DiNozzo is reunited with his old flame, Jeanne Benoit, when insurgents in Sudan attack a group of volunteer doctors, including her husband. Travelling to the crime scene to conduct a joint murder-kidnapping investigation, Dinozzi and McGee offer their assistance in searching for the missing doctors. Crime drama, starring Michael Weatherly and Sean Murray, with Scottie Thompson.(n)

programme.title: NCIS
programme.desc: Petty officer Kyle Friedgen is accused of killing his ex-girlfriend, but while his case is dismissed due to a mishandled warrant, his life and reputation are marred by suspicion that he got away with murder. Determined to clear his name in full, Friedgen volunteers to be court-martialled, on the condition that the NCIS team conducts its own investigation. Meanwhile, Bishop and Jake discuss their marital problems. Naval crime drama, starring Emily Wickersham, with Jamie Bamber.(n)

programme.title: Monk
programme.sub-title: Mr Monk and the Other Woman.
programme.desc: Stottlemeyer suspects a pretty blonde named Monica Waters is guilty of three murders - but Adrian is struck by her odd resemblance to his late wife Trudy and refuses to believe she could be guilty of foul play. Tony Shalhoub stars.(n)

programme.title: Monk
programme.sub-title: Mr Monk and the Marathon Man.
programme.desc: A woman is murdered while the San Francisco Marathon is taking place, and Monk suspects her married lover is to blame - even though he was one of the competitors and somehow managed to be registered at all checkpoints during the race. Tony Shalhoub stars.(n)

programme.title: The Closer
programme.desc: As Brenda and Fritz's wedding day approaches, one is preoccupied with a murder case and the other with the search for a drug lord. Starring Kyra Sedgwick and Jon Tenney.(n)

programme.title: The Closer

programme.title: NCIS
programme.desc: The two Marine brothers of a sailor battling leukaemia are killed in the line of duty, and to spare the servicemen's family further grief, the secretary of the US Navy seeks the NCIS team's help in locating a suitable bone marrow donor. programme.title: NCIS
programme.desc: Ducky is assaulted by a man who claims to have previously undisclosed information about his half-brother, who died decades ago. programme.desc: Phil, Stu, Alan, and Doug jet to Thailand for Stu's wedding and get into trouble after Stu's brother-in-law goes missing(n)

programme.title: The Hangover Part III
programme.desc: When Doug is kidnapped, pals Alan, Phil and Stu become embroiled in a battle to save him. Comedy(n)

programme.title: The Simpsons
programme.sub-title: On a Clear Day I Can't See My Sister
programme.desc: On a Clear Day I Can't See My Sister. Lisa takes out a restraining order against Bart, who has to go and live in the garden. Meanwhile, Homer takes over Grampa's job as a greeter at the SprawlMart, where he organises industrial unrest(n)

programme.title: The Simpsons
programme.desc: See Homer Run. Homer's heroics during an emergency (caused by Bart) lead him to join the throng running for mayor when Quimby faces a recall(n)

programme.title: The Simpsons
programme.desc: Marge Gamer. Marge goes online for the first time and becomes obsessed with a role-playing game that Bart and many of their neighbours are playing. Meanwhile, Lisa develops her own obsession---for soccer---and Homer becomes a referee(n)

programme.title: The Simpsons
programme.sub-title: Eternal Moonshine of the Simpson Mind
programme.desc: Eternal Moonshine of the Simpson Mind. Homer loses his memory---and his family---when he drinks Moe's most potent libation, the Forget-Me-Shot, in an episode that spoofs "Eternal Sunshine of the Spotless Mind" and "It's a Wonderful Life."(n)

programme.title: The Simpsons
programme.desc: Walking Big & Tall. Lisa discovers that Springfield's anthem was lifted from another town, so she composes a new one, while Homer gets a big lesson in "Wide Pride."(n)

programme.title: The Simpsons
programme.desc: Gal of Constant Sorrow. Bart accidentally deposits a homeless woman's cart into the river, and to make amends, he lets her move into his closet for a slight fee, and when Lisa discovers her there, she finds out the lady is a wonderful folk singer, but that she has some violence and substance-abuse skeletons in her closet. Meanwhile, not-so-handy Homer traps the cat in the walls of the house(n)

programme.title: The Simpsons
programme.desc: Take My Life, Please. Homer learns of election fraud in the race for senior-class president of his high school, and wonders how his life would have been different if he had won the election(n)

programme.title: The Simpsons
programme.desc: Million Dollar Maybe. Homer buys a lottery ticket that's a million-dollar winner, but he has to miss his date with Marge to do it(n)

programme.title: Archer
programme.desc: Archer Vice: Arrival/Departure. Archer helps Lana through childbirth. Meanwhile, Krieger must stop the delivery of a deadly weapon(n)

programme.title: Archer
programme.desc: The Holdout. Archer must salvage a crashed plane in the Season 6 premiere(n)

programme.title: BSL Zone
programme.desc: The End is a powerful drama spanning an imagined 60 year period, charting the introduction of the treatment' and the future decline of Deaf culture (SL).'.(n)

programme.title: Big Miracle
programme.desc: A reporter and an environmentalist discover a family of whales has become trapped by rapidly forming ice in the Arctic circle. They organise a coalition of unlikely allies, including Alaskan natives, oil tycoons and the Russian and American military, to pool their resources and rescue the animals. Fact-based drama, starring Drew Barrymore, John Krasinski, Ted Danson and Kristen Bell.(n)

programme.title: Marmaduke
programme.desc: An advertising executive tries to start a new life in California with his family and their lumbering, disaster-prone Great Dane. The friendly but clumsy dog accidentally causes chaos for his owners, until an incident at a surfing competition makes him a local celebrity. Comedy, with Lee Pace, and featuring the voice of Owen Wilson.(n)

programme.title: One Fine Day
programme.desc: The working day for two mismatched single professionals is thrown into turmoil when their children have to stay at home after missing a school trip. The pair agree to take it in turns to babysit while struggling to stick to their hectic schedules - but during the course of the day their feelings for each other blossom unexpectedly. Romantic comedy, starring George Clooney, Michelle Pfeiffer, Charles Durning and Mae Whitman.(n)

programme.title: Doctor Dolittle
programme.desc: A Victorian veterinary surgeon is certified insane after developing the ability to talk to his patients in their own language. Undaunted, he manages to escape from the asylum and embarks on a quest to locate a rare aquatic snail. Oscar-winning musical comedy, with Rex Harrison, Samantha Eggar, Richard Attenborough and Anthony Newley. Songs include Talk to the Animals and I've Never Seen Anything Like It.(n)

programme.title: School of Rock
programme.desc: A slobbish guitarist dreams of stardom, but his hopes are dashed when the other members of his band kick him out. Struggling to make ends meet, he takes a job as a supply teacher at an exclusive private school, and sets about moulding his pupils into rock gods. Comedy from director Richard Linklater, starring Jack Black, Joan Cusack, Mike White and Sarah Silverman.(n)

programme.title: The Heat
programme.desc: An uptight, ambitious FBI agent is sent to Boston to bring a notorious drug kingpin to justice. She ends up forced to team up with a rebellious, foul-mouthed local police detective who has a very different attitude to law enforcement but shares her inability to work with others. Action comedy, starring Sandra Bullock and Melissa McCarthy.(n)

programme.title: Four Christmases
programme.desc: A couple have always managed to avoid family festivities by travelling overseas. However, when their flight is cancelled, each of their divorced parents insists they spend yuletide with them - forcing the pair to get through a quartet of Christmas celebrations on the same day. Comedy, starring Vince Vaughn and Reese Witherspoon.(n)

programme.title: Once Upon a Time in Anatolia
programme.desc: Two men in a Turkish village confess to a murder and join a group of officials, including a doctor, a police chief and a prosecutor, to look for the victim's body in the nearby wilderness. As the search grows longer and more complicated than expected, other mysteries are brought to light. Crime drama, starring Muhammet Uzuner and Yilmaz Erdogan. In Turkish.(n)

programme.title: The Parent Trap
programme.desc: When twins sisters meet for the first time at summer camp, they decide it is high time their estranged parents got back together again, and hatch an ingenious plan to reunite them by swapping places with each other. Disney comedy, starring Hayley Mills in a dual role as both sisters, alongside Maureen O'Hara, Brian Keith and Leo G Carroll.(n)

programme.title: Pride and Prejudice
programme.desc: Elizabeth Bennet is one of five sisters whose mother is determined to find them suitable husbands. The arrival of a wealthy gentleman and his friends at a nearby mansion leads to an introduction between Elizabeth and the aloof Mr Darcy, to whom she takes an instant dislike. However, an unexpected attraction eventually develops. Period drama based on Jane Austen's novel, starring Keira Knightley, Matthew Macfadyen and Judi Dench.(n)

programme.title: First Daughter
programme.desc: The daughter of the US president is determined to lead a normal life and manages to persuade him to let her enrol at college as a normal student. However, she is unaware her father has hired a young special agent to go undercover at the same college - which creates a dilemma when she falls in love with him. Romantic comedy, starring Katie Holmes, Marc Blucas, Michael Keaton and Amerie.(n)

programme.title: Tootsie
programme.desc: A New York actor's difficult reputation has rendered him unemployable. When a TV soap advertises a new female role, he disguises himself as a woman for the audition - and wins the part. But the character proves so popular, he is forced to keep up the pretence indefinitely. Comedy, starring Dustin Hoffman, Jessica Lange and Bill Murray. Directed by Sydney Pollack, who makes a cameo appearance as Hoffman's agent.(n)

programme.title: Unbroken
programme.desc: Premiere. An Olympic athlete enlists in the US Air Force during the Second World War. When his plane is shot down, he and two crewmates survive for 33 days lost at sea. Worse is to come when they are captured by Japanese forces, and he endures brutal treatment in a PoW camp run by an infamous war criminal. Fact-based Second World War drama, directed by Angelina Jolie and starring Jack O'Connell and Domhnall Gleeson.(n)

programme.title: Ghost Rider: Spirit of Vengeance
programme.desc: The demon biker roams Eastern Europe, looking for a way to rid himself of his supernatural alter ego. He is approached by a mysterious monk, who needs help protecting a boy from the horrific destiny the Devil has in store for him. Fantasy thriller sequel, starring Nicolas Cage, Idris Elba, Ciaran Hinds and Christopher Lambert.(n)

programme.title: Barefoot Contessa
programme.desc: American chef and cookbook writer Ina Garten makes an anniversary dinner for her husband, Jeffrey, including coq au vin and garlic mashed potatoes.(n)

programme.title: Barefoot Contessa
programme.desc: American chef and cookbook writer Ina Garten throws a surprise baby shower, with Greek gazpacho, baked salmon nicoise and pecan shortbread on the menu.(n)

programme.title: Barefoot Contessa
programme.desc: American chef and cookbook writer Ina Garten cooks striped bass and couscous with pine nuts for a group of food-lovers.(n)

programme.title: Barefoot Contessa
programme.desc: American chef and cookbook writer Ina Garten throws a holiday dinner party for friends, featuring halibut, shrimp in a saffron sauce and a seafood gratin of lobster.(n)

programme.title: Anna Olson: Fresh
programme.desc: The chef introduces a selection of classic recipes that never go out of style.(n)

programme.title: Anna Olson: Fresh
programme.desc: Anna prepares a weekend brunch menu, including a breakfast bread pudding made from slices of French toast, bananas and custard.(n)

programme.title: The Healthy Gourmet
programme.desc: It's a face-off with a women's hockey team. Will Ezra and Julie be able to score in the kitchen by offering easy-to-prepare meals for these active ladies who like to play hard?.(n)

programme.title: The Pioneer Woman
programme.desc: Ree cooks up four sensational 16-minute meals for summer. On the menu is coriander lime salmon, a Greek feast to-go, perfect pasta with pesto and peas, and super-fast courgette noodles for a solo summertime supper.(n)

programme.title: The Pioneer Woman
programme.desc: Ree demonstrates three chicken dishes, including slow cooker chicken and broccoli, chicken pie and a chicken and kale caesar salad.(n)

programme.title: The Pioneer Woman
programme.desc: Ree and her daughter Paige reminisce over an afternoon tea for two, as they enjoy ham and leak mini quiches, garden spread finger sandwiches and lemon raspberry tarts.(n)

programme.title: The Pioneer Woman
programme.desc: It's boxing night, so Ree's running her sons to town for practice. She prepares a knockout dinner of Italian sloppy joes, garlic toast and a lemon meringue pie.(n)

programme.title: Extreme Cake Wars
programme.desc: Four bakers battle to have their amazing creations as the centrepiece of the Addams Family party, but only one will take home the $10,000 prize.(n)

programme.title: Beach Bites With Katie Lee
programme.desc: New series. From St Thomas to Mackinac Island, MI, Katie Lee is beach hopping to find the best local treats that islands have to offer.(n)

programme.title: Beach Bites With Katie Lee
programme.desc: From Caribbean squash to Mexico's raicilla liquor, Katie uncovers some of the best hometown favourites around.(n)

programme.title: Jamie at Home
programme.desc: Jamie Oliver demonstrates how to produce home-grown summer salads in even the most confined garden plot. He also offers advice on the basic principles of dressings, and shows how simple green leaves can form the basis of a roasted peach and bresaola salad with feta and yoghurt.(n)

programme.title: Jamie at Home
programme.desc: The chef uses home-grown produce from his Essex garden to create interesting variations for pizza toppings, including a calzone and a quattro gusti cooked in his traditional wood oven for an authentic rustic taste.(n)

programme.title: Jamie's American Road Trip
programme.desc: The travelling chef heads for New York, shunning the glamour of Manhattan to discover an underground gastronomic subculture run by some of the Big Apple's most colourful culinary personalities. In Queens, he meets a pioneer of Egyptian-style home-cooked food, and discovers two home-run restaurants providing the city's diners with exotic dishes at economy prices.(n)

programme.title: The Pioneer Woman
programme.desc: Ree celebrates her middle children with a week of food and fun while the others are away, making cornmeal pancakes with blueberry syrup, chicken alfredo and grilled fruit pizzas.(n)

programme.title: The Pioneer Woman
programme.desc: Ree Drummond's raids the pantry, and makes a fragrant chickpea curry with rice, then for sweet treats in a hurry, no-bake peanut butter bars save the day.(n)

programme.title: Extreme Cake Wars
programme.desc: Four bakers compete to have their cake appear at a party celebrating magic, with renowned magician Mat Franco is on hand to help choose which one will win.(n)

programme.title: Chopped Junior
programme.desc: Spin-off from the cookery competition featuring young contestants.(n)

programme.title: Jamie Does
programme.desc: Jamie Oliver travels around Europe and north Africa to experience local cultures through their cuisine, beginning in Marrakech, where he tries street food, visits a communal bread oven, makes a nomad stew and joins a family for lunch to sample Moroccan home cooking.(n)

programme.title: Jamie at Home
programme.desc: Jamie Oliver prepares dishes using strawberries grown in hanging baskets at his Essex plot. He uses the fruit to create a salad with speck and halloumi, rustles up a home-made jam to serve with a creamy rice pudding and presents his take on an old classic - grilled strawberries with Pimm's.(n)

programme.title: Jamie at Home
programme.desc: The chef prepares a selection of dishes using fresh peas and broad beans from his garden and demonstrates not only how easy they are to grow but also the bumper yield that can be achieved. He uses the vegetables as the final touches in a spaghetti and meatball dish, as well as creating `posh beans on toast' and a spicy fritter.(n)

programme.title: Man Fire Food
programme.desc: Roger Mooking searches the Gulf States for tasty food that deliver big flavours. Then he learns how they use coffee in Texas barbecue.(n)

programme.title: Man Fire Food
programme.sub-title: Mud And Steel In New Mexico.
programme.desc: Roger Mooking visits Comida de Campos in Embudo, a farm and cooking school where delicious feasts are cooked in cone-shaped clay ovens.(n)

programme.title: Jamie's American Road Trip
programme.desc: Just weeks after Hurricane Gustav wreaked havoc on Louisiana, Jamie Oliver visits the state, hoping to understand how food helps to maintain people's spirits through adversity. In New Orleans he calls at a Creole restaurant run by a self-styled gumbo queen, and is given the opportunity to learn the art of alligator hunting.(n)

programme.title: Restaurant Stakeout
programme.desc: Willie Degel helps to save Arne's struggling business, Division Street Grill. Its 15-year anniversary is just around the corner.(n)

programme.title: Mystery Diners
programme.desc: The owner of Marigny Brasserie, New Orleans has noticed an influx of rowdy tourists at his `locals' bar', so the Mystery Diners investigate who is profiting from the new customers.(n)

programme.title: Mystery Diners
programme.desc: After hearing rumours of his restaurant's signature cocktail being served at other bars, the owner of Victory, New Orleans contacts the Mystery Diners for help.(n)

programme.title: Bizarre Foods America
programme.desc: Andrew Zimmern stays up all night in the city that never sleeps to uncover the secrets to feeding hungry New Yorkers.(n)

programme.title: Restaurant: Impossible
programme.desc: Chef Robert Irvine comes to the aid of the three owners of The Fork Diner in Calhoun, who are faced with a failing business and a suffering friendship.(n)

programme.title: Mystery Diners
programme.desc: Carl, owner of the Bakehouse Restaurant and Bar in Austin, Texas, fears a dispute between his son and his favourite waitress is threatening the harmony of his establishment, so seeks the team's advice on the best way to proceed.(n)

programme.title: Mystery Diners
programme.desc: After hearing rumours that kegs of his privately brewed beer are showing up at local parties, Rick, owner of Uncle Billy's Brew and Que in Austin, Texas, contacts Charles for help.(n)

programme.title: Teleshopping
programme.desc: A chance to buy goods from the comfort of home.(n)

programme.title: Barefoot Contessa
programme.desc: American chef and cookbook writer Ina Garten welcomes her husband back from a trip away with lemon curd tart and mussels in white wine.(n)

programme.title: Barefoot Contessa
programme.desc: American chef and cookbook writer Ina Garten and her friends hold a dinner party, with spiral ham and maple baked beans as the main course.(n)

programme.desc: Ina Garten prepares a nostalgic birthday dinner for a friend.(n)

programme.title: Barefoot Contessa - Back to Basics
programme.desc: InaGarten cooks a Tex Mex meal with the help of her friend Devon Fredericks and her award-winning chilli recipe.(n)

programme.title: Anna Olson: Fresh
programme.desc: Anna shares her Grandma's recipe for cabbage rolls, where humble ingredients are able to shine.(n)

programme.title: Anna Olson: Fresh
programme.desc: Anna prepares a meal for her husband and shares her recipe for meatloaf with buttermilk mashed potatoes, warm sausage and pepper salad and an apple tart with salted caramel sauce.(n)

programme.title: The Pioneer Woman
programme.desc: Ree Drummond turns her attention to desserts, including marshmallow pops for a sleepover treat and lime and coconut butter cookies for her step-mother.(n)

programme.title: The Pioneer Woman
programme.desc: Ree is having a night on the town with Ladd, so she's prepping dinner for the kids in advance, making mini meatballs pasta bake and a mixed berry shortcake for dessert.(n)

programme.title: The Pioneer Woman
programme.desc: Ree works on great new ideas for cooking low carb, preparing grilled pork tenderloin with baby bok choy and roasted shrimp with cherry tomatoes and roasted lemon-chili broccoli.(n)

programme.title: The Pioneer Woman
programme.desc: Ree's family is throwing a joint birthday bash, so she's cooking up spicy pulled pork sliders, make-ahead slow cooker baked beans and a three-layer confetti cake for dessert.(n)

programme.title: Extreme Cake Wars
programme.desc: Four bakers compete to have their cake appear at a party celebrating magic, with renowned magician Mat Franco is on hand to help choose which one will win.(n)

programme.title: Beach Bites With Katie Lee
programme.desc: From Puerto Rican-tinged soul food to a Cuban-influenced ice cream shop, Katie learns the origins of some delicious tried-and-true family dishes.(n)

programme.title: Beach Bites With Katie Lee
programme.desc: Between a Florida-created Reuben sandwich, to an ice cream sandwich pressed like a panini in Georgia, chefs teach Katie how to bring some local flair to fan-favourite dishes.(n)

programme.desc: Jamie Oliver prepares dishes using strawberries grown in hanging baskets at his Essex plot. programme.desc: Ree Drummond's father-in-law, Chuck, is spearheading a big fence fixing project on the ranch, so Ree is saying thank you by delivering him and his crew a Tex-Mex lunch.(n)

programme.desc: Ree Drummond's cooks hearty breakfast biscuits that her husband and son are coming to collect on their way to feed the cattle.(n)

programme.title: Extreme Cake Wars
programme.desc: Four bakers create Monopoly inspired cakes for the centrepiece for a party celebrating the classic board game.(n)

programme.title: Chopped Junior

programme.title: Jamie Does
programme.desc: Jamie Oliver seeks the authentic tastes of Spain in Andalucia. He makes paella for the whole town of Ronda, birthplace of modern bullfighting, and is taught how to cut serrano ham by an award-winning father and son team. As he joins in the local festivities, including carrying a giant statue of the Virgin Mary from church to church, he takes time to cook tomato salad with chorizo, pork chops with Spanish beans, and quail's egg with black pudding.(n)

programme.title: Jamie at Home
programme.desc: Jamie Oliver prepares dishes using homegrown brassicas - a vegetable group that includes cauliflower, broccoli, curly kale and kohlrabi. The chef is surprised to discover how many of these plants can be eaten raw, but it does not stop him using them to prepare curried fritters and a hearty cannelloni.(n)

programme.title: Jamie at Home
programme.desc: The chef explains the value of pickling and preserving home-grown produce and explains why knowledge of these processes has been of vital importance throughout history. He goes on to demonstrate the procedure by pickling courgettes with mint and chilli, as well as aubergines with garlic and oregano.(n)

programme.title: Man Fire Food
programme.desc: Roger Mooking cruises through central California, home to many vineyards, but Paso de Record Vineyard in San Miguel has piqued Roger's interest.(n)

programme.title: Man Fire Food
programme.desc: Roger Mooking heads to Sloughhouse to visit Passmore Ranch, a freshwater, sustainable fish farm, before he heads on the hunt for Santa Maria-style barbecue.(n)

programme.desc: Guy Fieri enjoys the taste of the Far East. In Las Vegas, he samples a Japanese spot that prepares sushi and traditional udon, and in Denver he visits a Korean joint.(n)
