programme.title: Waiting for God
programme.desc: Financial problems force Diana to share a flat with Tom, and a new resident moves into Bayview. Comedy, starring Graham Crowden and Stephanie Cole.(n)

programme.title: Waiting for God
programme.desc: New resident Daisy tries to instil some discipline, but Diana is worried about her intentions toward Tom. Comedy, starring Stephanie Cole.(n)

programme.title: Ever Decreasing Circles
programme.desc: Martin gets trapped between the joists in a loft while spending a weekend in a country cottage - and is eventually obliged to call Paul to his rescue. Comedy, starring Richard Briers, Penelope Wilton and Peter Egan.(n)

programme.title: The Brittas Empire
programme.desc: Gordon arranges a christening rehearsal, but his clergyman brother has other things on his mind. Chris Barrie stars.(n)

programme.title: Last of the Summer Wine
programme.sub-title: The Man Who Invented Yorkshire Funny Stuff.
programme.desc: Howard is dismayed when Marina unwittingly buys him a life-like gorilla which attracts the attention of the local police. Meanwhile, a newspaper article prompts Truly, Clegg and Billy to try to track down Cyril Cooper - a man renowned for his green fingers and womanising ways. Comedy, starring Robert Fyfe.(n)

programme.title: Last of the Summer Wine
programme.sub-title: The Second Husband and the Showgirls.
programme.desc: Tom and Smiler arrange an interesting blind date and Truly discovers his ex-wife's new husband is coming to town. Frank Thornton and Stephen Lewis star.(n)

programme.title: Last of the Summer Wine
programme.desc: Cupid's arrow targets Truly when a woman from his past returns with amorous intentions, so everyone lends a hand in liberating him. Frank Thornton, Peter Sallis and Brian Murphy star in the last episode to feature Thora Hird as Edie Pegden.(n)

programme.title: The Good Life
programme.desc: Tom and Barbara's difficulties are for once dwarfed by those of Jerry, who has to choose between obeying his boss or attending Margo's production of The Sound of Music. Vintage comedy, starring Richard Briers, Felicity Kendal, Penelope Keith and Paul Eddington.(n)

programme.desc: Del and Rodney reluctantly agree to let Grandad accompany them on their holiday abroad - a decision they come to regret. Comedy, starring David Jason, Nicholas Lyndhurst and Lennard Pearce.(n)

programme.title: As Time Goes By
programme.desc: In an attempt to spite Lionel, Jean decides to make a play for his publisher Alistair. Comedy, starring Judi Dench and Geoffrey Palmer.(n)

programme.title: The Good Life
programme.desc: Tom's philosophy of life gains him two eager disciples - but he is soon anxious to be rid of them. Comedy, starring Richard Briers and Felicity Kendal.(n)

programme.title: Gavin & Stacey
programme.desc: Everyone gathers in Billericay as Pete and Dawn prepare to renew their wedding vows. Gavin feels uncomfortable about Gwen and Bryn knowing the details of his sex life, and Dave hears about the shocking events of the curry night. Meanwhile, Smithy goes beyond the call of friendship when he makes a staggering suggestion.(n)

programme.desc: Jeremy's mother comes to visit for a family funeral. Her son deeply resents her new boyfriend, a military man, but Mark idolises him and endures an extraordinary ordeal in a bid to win his favour. Award-winning comedy, starring Robert Webb and David Mitchell.(n)

programme.title: Bottom
programme.desc: Wretched flatmates Richie and Eddie go camping in the country - but a complete lack of basic equipment ensures their efforts to get back to nature end in disaster. Anarchic comedy, starring Rik Mayall and Adrian Edmondson.(n)

programme.title: The Thin Blue Line
programme.desc: The chance of promotion looms and Fowler decides he needs to become more respectable, leading him to believe marrying Patricia might improve his image. Old enemy Grim is also after the plum post. Ben Elton's comedy, starring Rowan Atkinson.(n)

programme.title: The Thick of It
programme.desc: Former minister Nicola Murray finds herself facing a new set of pressures in opposition following her party's election defeat, including being harassed by a man in an unusual costume. However, her problems mount when journalists get a glimpse of some embarrassing meeting notes - and she starts to worry about how close fellow shadow cabinet member Dan Miller is getting to media strategist Malcolm Tucker. Political satire, starring Rebecca Front and Peter Capaldi.(n)

programme.title: Open All Hours

programme.title: Bridget & Eamon
programme.desc: Comedy spin-off from Republic of Telly following the lives of an unhappily married couple and their indeterminate number of children, character already well-known to the viewing public from their appearances on Republic of Telly. Eamon always spends the money from the trocaire box, so parish priest Fr Gabriel is keeping an eye on him this year, while Bridget hosts a Tupperware party that goes disastrously wrong when illegal condoms are delivered instead. Jennifer Zamparelli and Bernard O'Shea star.(n)

programme.title: Gavin & Stacey
programme.desc: Bank Holiday Monday sees the Essex contingent arrive for a sunny day at the beach in Barry. Gavin has a heart-to-heart with his dad, which gives him much to think about, while a dark cloud looms on the horizon when Dave arrives to find Nessa and Smithy enjoying all the fun of the fair. Mathew Horne, Joanna Page, James Corden and Ruth Jones star.(n)

programme.desc: Mark acts as roadie for Jeremy and Super Hans when they find a band manager and play at a Christian rock festival, where he learns how to have sex properly for the first time in his life. Award-winning comedy, starring Robert Webb and David Mitchell.(n)

programme.title: Floyd on Fish
programme.desc: Keith Floyd visits St Malo's large fish market in Brittany, France, before going to a restaurant owned by Jacques Yves Cadiou. He also visits an oyster farm at Cancale, and prepares his favourite dish, bourride, at the Chalut eaterie.(n)

programme.title: Floyd on Fish
programme.desc: The chef buys the ingredients for bouillabaisse and visits the Duchy of Cornwall's oyster farm on the Helford River, before preparing mussels in their kitchen.(n)

programme.title: John Torode's Korean Food Tour
programme.desc: John's Korean adventure leads him to the superfood staple Kimchi, heading to Mangwon Market in Seoul where he's confronted with hundreds of different varieties.(n)

programme.title: MasterChef: The Professionals
programme.desc: It's the last week of the heats, and the first three chefs are set a task by Marcus, who wants them to fillet a whole plaice, steam a portion and serve it with a mushroom cream sauce, all in 20 minutes. The remaining three cooks are set a Skills Test by Monica, who asks them make the classic Crepe Suzette. Finally, the six contestants cook their Signature Dish. They have 75 minutes to perfectly execute their tried and tested recipe for Monica, Marcus and Gregg.(n)

programme.title: Junior Bake Off
programme.desc: The contestants prepare carrot-cake muffins, and bake treats inspired by their favourite festivals. Aaron Craze presents.(n)

programme.title: The Hairy Bakers
programme.desc: The food enthusiasts take their longest trip yet, searching for pies and pasties. They begin their journey in Cornwall, heading to the Midlands to visit an orchard and produce an apple pie, and northwards to the home of Dave Myers, where fellow presenter Si King makes chicken and mushroom pie. The duo's trip ends in Scotland, where they prepare salmon coulibiac for Highland dancers.(n)

programme.title: Heston's Fantastical Food
programme.desc: Heston Blumenthal celebrates the packed lunch the only way he knows how, by filling a theme park with super-sized versions of nostalgic favourites and inviting disillusioned lunchers on a surprise school trip. His epic pack-up includes a massive sandwich big enough to feed a coachload of hungry adults, a bag of Hula Hoops with crisps so large they can fit on people's heads and an enormous carton of the 1980s fruit drink Um Bongo. Finally, he realises a childhood dream by creating the world's biggest Kit Kat.(n)

programme.desc: Cyrus Todiwala and Anjum Anand go head to head to prove they can cook delicious Indian food.(n)

programme.title: MasterChef: The Professionals
programme.desc: This week's final heat sees six more chefs enter the kitchen to compete for the last places in the quarter-final. Monica's skills test challenges three of them to prepare langoustines and serve them with a Marie Rose sauce, and Marcus's tests the other three on their ability to make a burger in 20 minutes. The chefs then have the chance to showcase their style, technical skill and flair with their signature dish, aiming to prove to the judges that they deserve to remain in the competition.(n)

programme.title: MasterChef: The Professionals
programme.desc: This week's final heat sees six more chefs enter the kitchen to compete for the last places in the quarter-final. Monica's skills test challenges three of them to prepare langoustines and serve them with a Marie Rose sauce, and Marcus's tests the other three on their ability to make a burger in 20 minutes. The chefs then have the chance to showcase their style, technical skill and flair with their signature dish, aiming to prove to the judges that they deserve to remain in the competition.(n)

programme.title: August Rush
programme.desc: Kirsten Sheridan's family drama stars Freddie Highmore as Evan Taylor, a musical prodigy searching for his parents. When pregnant cellist Lyla Novacek was hit by a car, her controlling father and manager told her she'd lost the baby; in reality she gave birth prematurely and her father sent the infant to an orphanage. Eleven years later, when Evan finds out that his parents are alive, he sets out to find them, taking inspiration from the music around him. The heart of the film is Evan's almost mystical ability to 'feel' music, a challenging concept that is rendered believable thanks to inventive work from the composer of the main score, Mark Mancina. Also starring Jonathan Rhys Meyers as Evan's rock singer father, and Robin Williams as a modern-day Fagin who Evan meets during his search for his family(n)

programme.title: Making of 'Jackie'
programme.desc: A look at "Jackie," a 2016 drama about former first lady Jacqueline Onassis from her time in the White House to the aftermath of the assassination of her husband, President John F. Kennedy, in 1963. The film stars Natalie Portman, Greta Gerwig and Peter Sarsgaard, and is directed by Pablo Larraín(n)

programme.title: Girl with a Pearl Earring
programme.desc: Drama inspired by a portrait of a young woman painted by 17th-century Dutch artist Johannes Vermeer. A young peasant girl, employed as a maid in the Vermeer household, charms the artist with her grace and beauty to the point where he feels compelled to capture her qualities on canvas(n)

programme.title: The Simpsons Movie
programme.desc: America's favourite family make their debut on the big screen in David Silverman's comedy. When Homer rescues a pig from certain death, little does he realise the full consequences of his action: Springfield will be isolated from the world by a gargantuan glass dome. It's the only way the government can prevent the pollution that he caused escaping to the outside world and creating a race of six-eyed squirrels. The townsfolk, armed with torches and pitchforks, are soon after him, and the family have to flee to Alaska. But even Homer knows he must return to do the right thing... Warning: contains full frontal male nudity(n)

programme.desc: Ashton Kutcher and Brittany Murphy are a chalk-and-cheese couple who fall in love and marry. programme.desc: The Actor. Bret and Jemaine ask a part-time actor to lift Murray's sagging spirits after a lacklustre gig, but the thespian goes a little too far in his efforts(n)

programme.title: How to Let Go of the World and Love All the Things Climate Can't Change
programme.desc: A look at communities around the world that have been harshly impacted by the effects of climate change. This documentary also spotlights inspiring efforts to create a greener, more-sustainable existence(n)

programme.title: The Simpsons Movie
programme.desc: America's favourite family make their debut on the big screen in David Silverman's comedy. When Homer rescues a pig from certain death, little does he realise the full consequences of his action: Springfield will be isolated from the world by a gargantuan glass dome. It's the only way the government can prevent the pollution that he caused escaping to the outside world and creating a race of six-eyed squirrels. The townsfolk, armed with torches and pitchforks, are soon after him, and the family have to flee to Alaska. But even Homer knows he must return to do the right thing... Warning: contains full frontal male nudity(n)

programme.title: Almost Christmas
programme.desc: An estranged family reunite over the holidays for the first time since the death of their matriarch(n)

programme.title: Max Payne
programme.desc: Hardboiled detective Max Payne obsessively hunts the murderer who killed his wife and child(n)

programme.title: Last Week Tonight With John Oliver
programme.desc: 08-06-2017. No additional information is available(n)

programme.title: Just Married
programme.desc: Ashton Kutcher and Brittany Murphy are a chalk-and-cheese couple who fall in love and marry. Now, all they need for the union to work is to survive both families who disapprove of the match, deal with the well-meaning friends who meddle too much and, on their honeymoon, suffer a selection of Europe's worst accommodation. Shawn Levy's romantic comedy, although occasionally succumbing to America's view of Europe, is held together by the two leads, particularly Murphy's unexpected gift for comedy(n)

programme.title: Get Smart
programme.desc: Bumbling agent Maxwell Smart (Steve Carell), of the top-secret agency CONTROL, teams up with Agent 99 (Anne Hathaway), a lethal beauty, to protect the world from the forces of KAOS. But can the world survive the chaos Max inadvertently creates? Alan Arkin, Dwayne Johnson, Terence Stamp(n)

programme.title: Adaptation
programme.desc: A screenwriter struggling to adapt a book decides to insert himself into the screenplay, with unexpected results(n)

programme.title: Real Time With Bill Maher
programme.desc: 08-04-2017. No additional information is available(n)

programme.title: Vice News Tonight
programme.desc: Episode 178. No additional information is available(n)

programme.title: HBO First Look: 'War for the Planet of the Apes'
programme.desc: A look at "War for the Planet of the Apes," a 2017 thriller about an ape army's struggle against homo sapiens. The film stars Andy Serkis, Woody Harrelson and Steve Zahn, and is directed by Matt Reeves(n)

programme.title: Max Payne
programme.desc: Hardboiled detective Max Payne obsessively hunts the murderer who killed his wife and child(n)

programme.title: Popstar: Never Stop Never Stopping
programme.desc: This mockumentary satire of the music business and modern celebrity centers on self-absorbed pop rapper Conner4Real (Andy Samberg). Once a member of a popular rap trio called the Style Boyz, Conner is now a solo artist about to drop his second album. Unfortunately, the release gets abysmal reviews, and his career begins to melt down when his attempts at rehabing his image lead to such disasters as a global blackout and a proposal to his girlfriend interrupted by a wolf attack. Eventually, Conner considers burying the hatchet with former colleagues Owen (Jorma Taccone) and Lawrence (Akiva Schaffer) in order to reunite the Style Boyz. Tim Meadows, Maya Rudolph, Sarah Silverman, and Imogen Poots co-star. Samberg, Taccone, and Schaffer co-wrote the screenplay, while Taccone and Schaffer shared directing duties(n)

programme.title: Next Day Air
programme.desc: A drug shipment is sent to the wrong address, prompting a frantic race to recover the package before its contents are revealed in this hilarious crime comedy. Brody (Mike Epps) and Guch have mistakenly received a package containing 10 kilos of cocaine. If they can just find a buyer, they'll be rich. Meanwhile, intended recipients Jesus and Chita try to track down the shipment before drug lord Bodego Diablo realizes it's missing. But Bodega already knows the score and he wants his drugs(n)

programme.title: Mavis!
programme.desc: A look at the life of legendary soul singer Mavis Staples and her family group, the Staple Singers. Mavis was a trailblazer who developed a unique gospel sound and was actively involved in the civil rights movement(n)

programme.title: About a Boy
programme.desc: London's most frequently eligible bachelor gets some lessons in growing up from a maladroit 12-year-old boy in this third big-screen adaptation of a Nick Hornby novel, directed and co-written by siblings Chris and Paul Weitz of American Pie fame. About a Boy concerns the parallel coming-of-age stories of the thirtysomething Will (Hugh Grant), a layabout "serial nice guy" living a posh, carefree lifestyle off his deceased father's fortune; and the preteen Marcus (Nicholas Hoult), a bright but awkward youth who's tired of his mom Fiona's (Toni Collette) depressed, boyfriend-less state. Their paths collide when Will, deciding that single mothers are the easiest romantic conquests on the dating scene, fabricates a two-year-old son and joins a group called S.P.A.T. (Single Parents Alone Together). Marcus is wise to Will's scheme, however, and through some incessant pestering and blackmail, he contrives for Will to date Fiona. Though Will doesn't hit it off immediately with either Marcus or his mother, he gradually begins to open up to the people around him -- so much so that he attracts the attention of another attractive single mom (Rachel Weisz). A U.S./U.K. co-production of Robert DeNiro's Tribeca Films and Tim Bevan and Eric Fellner's Working Title (the company responsible for the Grant-related Four Weddings and a Funeral and Bridget Jones's Diary), About a Boy was co-written by What's Eating Gilbert Grape creator Peter Hedges(n)

programme.title: Lara Croft: Tomb Raider
programme.desc: Join Lara Croft, a sexy video-game goddess as she battles villainous forces while racing to recover an ancient magical artefact that has the power to control time and space(n)

programme.title: Legend
programme.desc: This thriller follows the rise and fall of Ronald and Reginald Kray, identical twin gangsters who built a criminal empire in London during the 1950s and '60s(n)

programme.title: Robin Hood: Men in Tights
programme.desc: A veteran of the Crusades brings together a ragtag group to do battle against an evil king, and gets help from a surprising source inside the royal castle in this spoof of the Robin Hood legend(n)

programme.title: The Conjuring 2
programme.desc: In this terrifying horror sequel, husband-and-wife paranormal investigators Ed and Lorraine Warren help a single mother living in 1977 London, who claims that she and her children are being terrorized by supernatural forces(n)

programme.title: Watchmen
programme.desc: A dystopian fantasy adventure based on an unusually faithful adaptation of the highly regarded graphic novel written by Alan Moore (the genre's High Priest), directed by Zach Snyder. It's 1985 and Richard Nixon continues his tenure in the White House, massively popular with the electorate following his crushing defeat of the Viet Cong. However, it seems that the American public have fallen out of love with their superheroes, one of whom, Dr Manhattan, was largely responsible for the winning the VIetnam War. Now, he and his fellow crime-fighters are regarded as reprehensible vigilantes and have been banned by law. But, when one of their number - the vile, ironically named Comedian - is murdered, the former heroes begin to re-emerge from the shadows to investigate. They discover that a terrifying plan is afoot..(n)

programme.title: Room 104
programme.desc: Pizza Boy. A pizza delivery boy gets caught up in a couple's twisted games(n)

programme.title: Ballers
programme.desc: In the Teeth. Spencer encounters resistance to his Las Vegas expansion initiative in Los Angeles and Oakland. Meanwhile, Charles feels slighted by Larry for not getting credit after he landed a coveted lineman; Joe takes a detour with Reggie; Jason rebukes Kisan for his lack of transparency; and Ricky jumps to conclusions(n)

programme.desc: In this collection of crime tales set in the underbelly of a miserable metropolis, a bruiser seeks the person who killed his one-night stand. Elsewhere, a cop is framed for a series of murders, and a group of prostitutes must dispose of a dead body(n)

programme.title: Blues Brothers 2000
programme.desc: Dan Aykroyd returns as Elwood Blues in this long-awaited sequel to the 1980 comedy. After 18 years in prison and death of his brother Jake, Elwood is on a new "Mission from God"--- to reunite the old band and give a troubled orphan a new lease on life. Joe Morton, J. Evan Bonifant, Nia Peeples, Kathleen Freeman, Frank Oz, Steve Lawrence, Erykah Badu, Darrell Hammond. Directed by John Landis(n)

programme.title: K-PAX
programme.desc: Kevin Spacey stars as a homeless man who claims to be a visitor from another planet in this wondrous fable about faith and miracles. He's committed to a mental hospital, where he is treated by a psychiatrist (Jeff Bridges) who's intrigued by his tales and his intelligence. Soon his outlandish story begins to seem plausible. Mary McCormack, Alfre Woodard, David Patrick Kelly(n)

programme.title: Terminal Velocity
programme.desc: Action thriller about a skydiving instructor who is plunged into the world of international espionage when one of his pupils falls to her death. Approached by a mysterious woman for lessons, he is horrified when her chute fails to open. Blamed for her death - and his training centre closed down - he becomes suspicious and decides to investigate, only to discover that the woman is very much alive... and a former KGB agent(n)

programme.title: Demolition
programme.desc: In this intriguing dramedy, an investment banker copes with his wife's sudden death by dismantling the machines surrounding him. Meanwhile, his complaints to a vending-machine company spark an unexpected relationship with a customer-service rep(n)

programme.title: Hacksaw Ridge
programme.desc: Biopic about World War II Army medic Desmond Doss, a conscientious objector who refused to take a life or even carry a weapon. Doss was eventually awarded the Medal of Honor for saving the lives of 75 soldiers on the battlefields of Okinawa(n)

programme.title: Ready to Rumble
programme.desc: Can two inept amateurs help a fading wrestling star make a comeback? A veteran professional wrestler (Oliver Platt) is no longer winning matches, thus disappointing his fans, especially a pair of grappling enthusiasts (David Arquette and Scott Caan) who regard the aging fighter as their hero. They come up with what they believe is a foolproof plan to put their favorite fighter back on top: they'll pose as a wrestling tag team, stage a match with their favorite, lose in a truly embarrassing manner, and thus clear the way for his comeback. But is returning to the top of the card really this simple? Ready to Rumble also features Martin Landau and Rose McGowan, with several stars from the WCW professional wrestling league playing themselves, including Bill Goldberg(n)

programme.title: MASH
programme.desc: Robert Altman's celebrated black comedy that focuses on the everyday lives of the odd assortment of characters who comprise the Mobile Army Surgery Hospital, stationed near the front during the Korean War(n)

programme.title: Big Trouble
programme.desc: Corrupt exec Arthur Herk is trying to buy a nuclear bomb. Russian mobsters want the weapon, and two hitmen arrive in Miami to take him out. Add hippies, sarcastic kids and a lorryload of goats for a chaotic comedy(n)

programme.title: The Women
programme.desc: Meg Ryan, Eva Mendes and Annette Bening head an all-female cast in this comedy drama, a remake of George Cukor's 1939 satire, from writer-director Diane English. Mary Haines thinks she has it all - a happy marriage, a lovely daughter, a top clothes designer job at her father's firm and a solid circle of very good friends. But then she hears through the grapevine that her husband is having an affair with a perfume saleswoman and, with that one thread unpicked, her entire world begins to unravel… Also starring Debra Messing, Jada Pinkett Smith, Candice Bergen, Cloris Leachman, Bette Midler and Carrie Fisher(n)

programme.title: Keeping Up With the Joneses
programme.desc: An ordinary suburban couple discover that their hospitable new neighbors are actually government spies. Soon, all four of them are caught up in an international espionage imbroglio(n)

programme.title: The Big Lebowski
programme.desc: The Dude" Lebowski, mistaken for a millionaire Lebowski, seeks restitution for his ruined rug and enlists his bowling buddies to help get it(n)

programme.title: The Boss
programme.desc: Michelle Darnell is a successful businesswoman who is sent to prison after being convicted of insider trading. She tries to start over after being released, but not everyone is ready to forgive and forget(n)

programme.title: The Blues Brothers
programme.desc: Two soul-singing brothers are sent on a "mission from God" to raise $5000 to save a Chicago orphanage. On their fund-raising tour de force, they encounter a multitude of mishaps and mayhem(n)

programme.title: Screwed
programme.desc: Comedy about a disgruntled chauffeur who kidnaps his boss' beloved dog but finds himself being suspected as the victim in the case when the canny canine gets away. When the dog returns home, the mistress becomes convinced that it is the chauffeur himself who is the victim of a terrible crime(n)

programme.desc: A woman finds she is forced to educate herself on the etiquette of wooing the opposite sex when she finally meets Mr. Right(n)

programme.title: The Boss
programme.desc: Michelle Darnell is a successful businesswoman who is sent to prison after being convicted of insider trading. She tries to start over after being released, but not everyone is ready to forgive and forget(n)

programme.title: Rushmore
programme.desc: Jason Schwartzman stars in this quirky comedy as an ambitious prep-school student. While he flirts with expulsion, he also cultivates a romantic fixation on a teacher, and befriends a local steel magnate (Bill Murray) who encourages the teen's dreams. Olivia Williams, Seymour Cassel, Brian Cox, Mason Gamble(n)

programme.title: Hairspray
programme.desc: Adam Shankman's adaptation of the 2005 musical stars John Travolta, Queen Latifah and Nikki Blonsky. Teen Tracy Turnblad's regular cultural highlight is a local television music and dance programme called The Corny Collins Show. And, like all her friends, she dreams of having a chance to appear on it. However, this is Baltimore and it is 1962 - and Tracy's both overweight and, worse, has liberal attitudes to race relations, which don't sit comfortably with the segregationist views of the show's producer. But, could Tracy's ambitions for not only appearing on the show, but also racially integrating it, receive a fillip when she meets the son of Motormouth Maybelle, host of the monthly 'Negro Day' edition of the show?(n)

programme.title: Martin Lawrence Live: Runteldat
programme.desc: Martin Lawrence is one of America's top black comedians, spoken of in the same breath as the late Richard Pryor and Eddie Murphy when they were at the height of their stand-up powers, and he's also appeared in films including Big Momma's House and Bad Boys. But he's also suffered setbacks in his personal life, from being arrested with a loaded gun at an airport to being accused by his co-star in the TV show Martin of sexual harassment. In this outstanding film of his stand-up routine, he confronts his demons and those who demonise him, as well as veering off to his favourite subject: women, and how hard they are to live with. And 'rundletat' is short for 'run and tell that'(n)

programme.title: Blues Brothers 2000
programme.desc: Dan Aykroyd returns as Elwood Blues in this long-awaited sequel to the 1980 comedy. After 18 years in prison and death of his brother Jake, Elwood is on a new "Mission from God"--- to reunite the old band and give a troubled orphan a new lease on life. Joe Morton, J. Evan Bonifant, Nia Peeples, Kathleen Freeman, Frank Oz, Steve Lawrence, Erykah Badu, Darrell Hammond. Directed by John Landis(n)

programme.title: Major Payne
programme.desc: Comedy about a born fighter who is thrown out of the army and winds up training a group of junior cadets. Major Payne (Damon Wayans) is ejected from the army after his commanding officer advises him that he has killed everyone and that there is no one left to fight. In desperation, the fearsome Payne finds a civilian job teaching combat skills to a mixed bunch of kids at a private school - and the results are hilarious!(n)

programme.title: Tracey Ullman's Show
programme.desc: Epsiode 5. Kate Middleton's mother babysits Prince George; Maggie Smith mulls an action movie franchise; a zookeeper misses her favorite monkey; American tourists see a darker side of Britain; a vicar is late for a funeral and turns to social media for help(n)

programme.title: Next Day Air
programme.desc: A drug shipment is sent to the wrong address, prompting a frantic race to recover the package before its contents are revealed in this hilarious crime comedy. Brody (Mike Epps) and Guch have mistakenly received a package containing 10 kilos of cocaine. If they can just find a buyer, they'll be rich. Meanwhile, intended recipients Jesus and Chita try to track down the shipment before drug lord Bodego Diablo realizes it's missing. But Bodega already knows the score and he wants his drugs(n)

programme.title: Blast From the Past
programme.desc: A naive man experiences the real world for the first time after being raised in a bomb shelter since the Cuban Missile Crisis. While stocking up on supplies for his still-underground parents, he falls for a very modern, very cynical woman of the '90s(n)

programme.title: Catch Me if You Can
programme.desc: Amazing true crime story about teenage con man Frank Abagnale Jr - who cashed fake cheques worth over $2.5m while disguised as a pilot, a doctor and a lawyer - and the FBI agent who caught him(n)

programme.title: Le Divorce
programme.desc: Kate Hudson and Naomi Watts dazzle in this charming comedy of manners from Ismail Merchant and James Ivory. Hudson plays an aimless American who soaks up the local culture while visiting her unhappy, pregnant half-sister (Watts) in Paris. The stellar supporting cast includes Leslie Caron, Glenn Close, Sam Waterston and Stockard Channing(n)

programme.title: Don't Tell Mom the Babysitter's Dead
programme.desc: Christina Applegate stars in this convoluted comedy that comes across as a teen fantasy combination of Home Alone and Working Girl. The premise is all in the title -- when the mother (Concetta Tomei) of a sniveling group of surly kids goes on a much-deserved summer vacation, she leaves her kids under the charge of an elderly distaff granny (Eda Reiss Merin). When granny ups and dies, the kids load her dead body in a trunk and deposit the package on the steps of the local funeral home. The kids are ecstatic thinking that with the big wad of cash Mom has left, they can have a summer of consumer madness. But when they find out that the money has been buried with the baby-sitter, the kids have to fend for themselves to make ends meet. Dream teen Sue Ellen (Christina Applegate) tries working at a fast food restaurant but she can't stand the grease. So, she puts together a false resume and, posing as a twenty-eight-year old, she applies for a job as a receptionist at a garment manufacturing company. The company vice president, Rose (Joanna Cassidy), is so impressed by her resume that she hires her on the spot as her executive assistant. Her deception looks to be working out great -- Sue Ellen manages to hold off the office lady killer Gus (John Getz), avoids exposure by the embittered receptionist, borrows money from the company's petty cash box for household incidentals, and continues her relationship with restaurant employee Bryan (Josh Charles). But suddenly, the clothing firm is set to go under, and Sue Ellen must use her teen fashion sense to save the company and her job . . . and she has to get the rest of the brood involved(n)

programme.title: What Women Want
programme.desc: Romantic comedy about a chauvinistic advertising executive who acquires the ability to hear what women are thinking. He attempts to use this power to bring about the fall of his female boss. But as he uses this inside knowledge to outwit his superior, the bachelor begins to fall in love with her, and so finds himself feeling more than a little guilty when his plan to have her sacked looks like it may come to fruition(n)

programme.title: Aliens in the Attic
programme.desc: A kids' sci-fi comedy-adventure from director John Schultz and penned by British screenwriter Mark Burton. Teen maths whiz Tom Pearson is on holiday with his extended family at a remote lakeside cottage, where he and the other children make an unexpected discovery: four small, green extra-terrestrial creatures lurking in the loft. The aliens are freshly arrived from outer space and don't waste too much time in setting about their goal - the subjugation of mankind. However, it's equally swiftly apparent that their chosen method of conquest - a mind-control device - only works on adults. And so the scene is set for Tom and the other minors to make a brave stand against the incomers on behalf of Earth's human population(n)

programme.title: The Great Muppet Caper
programme.desc: The Great Muppet Caper is the second Muppet film and it is considerably more complex than its predecessor, The Muppet Movie, which was essentially just a road movie. As the film begins, Kermit the Frog and Fozzie Bear are reporters who have failed to bag a story of a London jewel heist, which happened under their watch. The real criminals managed to escape and frame Miss Piggy as the thief. Kermit, Fozzie and the Great Gonzo set out on a mission to solve the mystery and track down the criminals who stole the Baseball Diamond. There are fewer star cameos and songs in The Great Muppet Caper than in The Muppet Movie, although appearances from John Cleese and Charles Grodin are particularly memorable(n)

programme.title: Mighty Morphin Power Rangers: The Movie
programme.desc: Based on a popular U.S. children's action show, this chopsocky sci-fi fantasy tells the tale of six courageous teenagers. programme.title: The Secret Life of Bees
programme.desc: Drama starring Queen Latifah and Dakota Fanning, set in South Carolina during the turbulent struggle for civil rights in the early 60s. Fourteen-year-old Lily Owens is seeking to escape the clutches of her abusive father and find some relief from the haunting memories of her mother's death. In her attempt to find peace, she flees to the comforting, supportive, empowering environment created by August Boatwright and her sisters, May, and June. There, she finds a sense of purpose in looking after the sisters' bees, romance with local boy Zach and a fuller understanding of her mother's past(n)

But soon the magic gourd begins to drive the lad out of his gourd. Gigi Leung, Peisi Chen. Directed by John Chu and Frankie Chung, and written by Chu and Lam Kee To, who adapted the popular 1958 kids' book by Zhang Tianyi(n)

But with the help of some fellow four-legged friends, Pongo and Perdita (whose offspring are amongst the missing puppies) launch a rescue mission and nothing, not even Cruella's bumbling henchmen Jasper and Horace, will stop them! programme.title: The Princess Diaries 2: Royal Engagement
programme.desc: Along with her best friend, American teenager Mia Thermopolis (Anne Hathaway) travels to Genovia after their high-school graduation to take up her duties as a princess. But her life is turned upside down when she not only learns that she is to take the crown as queen earlier than expected, but that she is also to be married before this event. Queen Clarice asks that Mia be allowed time to find a husband, and she is given 30 days. However, greedy Viscount Mabrey will try to do what he can to stop that. He wasn't counting on the fact that his nephew has met Mia and they are both attracted to each other'(n)

programme.title: Independence Day: Resurgence
programme.desc: This stunning sci-fi sequel finds the nations of Earth banding together to fight off a second alien invasion, 20 years after the first attack brought humanity to the brink of extinction. Using recovered extraterrestrial technology, the alliance readies itself for a massive war(n)

programme.title: Jason Bourne
programme.desc: Now fully recovered from his amnesia, former CIA assassin Jason Bourne attempts to uncover the truth behind his father's death in this pulse-pounding sequel. At the same time, he must evade the government forces hot on his trail(n)

programme.title: The Green Inferno
programme.desc: After their plane crashes in the Amazon, a group of young American activists on a mission to save the rainforest are captured by a tribe of cannibals(n)

programme.title: American Psycho
programme.desc: A rich Wall Street player basks in his late-1980s yuppie lifestyle, but behind his slick appearance lurks a murderous monster(n)
Nine sackcloth dolls, created by a scientist to preserve the spirit of humanity, battle monstrous machines on a post-apocalyptic Earth(n)

programme.title: Book of Shadows: Blair Witch 2
programme.desc: Four fans of the original Blair Witch movie meet with a tour guide and head into the woods in Burkittsville, MD with their own camera equipment to explore the site of the famous murders and decide the extent of its truth and myth(n)

programme.title: Wes Craven Presents: They
programme.desc: After her best friend kills himself, a psychology student wonders whether the terror she experienced as a child was based in reality. Creepy horror with something nasty in the lift shaft(n)

programme.title: Be Kind Rewind

programme.title: Loving
programme.desc: Enthralling biopic about Virginian interracial couple Richard and Mildred Loving, whose arrest in 1958 for violating the state's miscegenation laws eventually led to a landmark Supreme Court decision(n)

programme.title: Hacksaw Ridge
programme.desc: Biopic about World War II Army medic Desmond Doss, a conscientious objector who refused to take a life or even carry a weapon. Doss was eventually awarded the Medal of Honor for saving the lives of 75 soldiers on the battlefields of Okinawa(n)

programme.title: The Eiger Sanction
programme.desc: Clint Eastwood both directed and starred in this thriller based on a novel by Trevanian. Dr. Jonathan Hemlock (Eastwood) is a professor of art history who formerly had a deadly secret life; he was a hired assassin working with an international intelligence organization. Normally content to collect and study art, Hemlock is forced by blackmail to perform one last hit, or, as the organization euphemistically calls it, a "sanction." The victim will be one of three men attempting a dangerous ascent of the Eiger, a beautiful but punishing mountain range in Swiss Alps. While Hemlock is an experienced mountaineer and willing to make the climb, he's troubled to discover that he does not know which of the other three men scaling the Eiger is his true target. The supporting cast includes George Kennedy and Jack Cassidy; the latter earned enthusiastic reviews for his over-the-top performance as a flamboyantly gay secret agent(n)

programme.title: The Brothers Bloom
programme.desc: Wonderful chemistry among leads Adrien Brody, Mark Ruffalo and Rachel Weisz sparks this enthralling caper comedy. The guys play sibling con men who are out to make a multi-million-dollar score, and Weisz portrays their victim, a kooky heiress they string along until complications, like she and Brody falling in love, put a hitch in their plan. Rinko Kikuchi is a blast as a demolition expert, "an artist with nitroglycerin," they employ as part of their sting. Robbie Coltrane, Maximilian Schell(n)

programme.title: Loving
programme.desc: Enthralling biopic about Virginian interracial couple Richard and Mildred Loving, whose arrest in 1958 for violating the state's miscegenation laws eventually led to a landmark Supreme Court decision(n)

programme.desc: Kal Penn and John Cho return in this outrageous and unrated sequel. The pot-smoking slacker pals are suspected of being terrorists---and have more irreverent misadventures with Neil Patrick Harris. Rob Corddry, Roger Bart, David Krumholtz, Eddie Kaye Thomas. Written and directed by Jon Hurwitz and Hayden Schlossberg(n)

programme.title: Spring Breakdown
programme.desc: Gayle, Becky and Judi are three thirty-something friends who decide to break the monotony of their lives by vacationing on an island that's a popular spring break getaway for college coeds. One of them works for a powerful senator, and is also on a mission to prevent his daughter from embarrassing her family, only the girl is as geeky as her chaperones(n)

programme.title: Doomsday
programme.desc: Post-apocalyptic thriller about efforts to contain a deadly virus in Great Britain(n)

programme.title: The Royal Tenenbaums
programme.desc: In this delightfully offbeat comedy about an eccentric New York family, the clan's estranged patriarch(Gene Hackman) finds out his ex-wife (Anjelica Huston) has plans to remarry, and tries to finagle his way back into their lives by claiming he's dying. Ben Stiller, Gwyneth Paltrow, Luke Wilson, Danny Glover, Owen Wilson. Wes Anderson ("Rushmore") directed(n)

programme.title: Shakespeare in Love
programme.desc: One of the wittiest, most charming film comedies ever made, Shakespeare in Love is a brilliantly fictional story behind the creation of one of the most enduring pieces of literature ever written by the most acclaimed writer of all-time. Plagued with debt, writer's block, and fallen far past deadline for his latest play, it seems like things can't get much worse for young William Shakespeare (Joseph Fiennes). Then Will meets Viola, a young lady masquerading as man(n)

programme.title: Flight of the Conchords
programme.desc: Yoko. Jemaine and Murray wonder if Bret's girlfriend is trying to split up the band when Bret begins spending more time with her(n)

programme.title: Executive Decision
programme.desc: Action thriller about an anti-terrorist squad on an airborne mission to rescue a Washington-bound plane from hijackers armed with nerve gas. With millions of lives at stake and authorities anxious to shoot the plane down, a desperate mission is authorised to board and retake the plane in flight, but success depends on the skills of a desk-bound civil servant(n)

programme.title: Fire Down Below
programme.desc: The sleepy appearance of an Appalachian coal-mining community belies the presence of a sinister toxic waste-dumping scheme that is poisoning local plant and animal life as well as area residents. The murder of an environmental protection agency investigator leads officials to assign Jack Taggart (Steven Segal) to go undercover as a handyman working through a relief mission. It doesn't take him long to discover that the mastermind of the dumping is local businessman Orin Hanner (Kris Kristofferson). Along the way, Taggart falls for the mysterious Sarah Kellogg (Marg Helgenberger), a young woman ostracized for a sordid past and a father who died under suspicious circumstances while working for Hanner. When Taggart's undercover work proves ineffective, he provokes a direct confrontation with the villain and his henchmen that results in plenty of Segal's trademark martial arts action. In addition to kicking the stuffing out of bad guys, Segal demonstrates a real knack for playing bluegrass guitar(n)

programme.title: Emelie

The merchant falls in love with the occidental concubine of a Japanese baron, though he has a loyal and doting wife awaiting his return(n)

Kate (MacDowell) gets together once a week with friends to lament their boring love lives. But that changes when Kate takes up with a much younger man, and has to deal with the reactions of her surprised friends. Imelda Staunton, Anna Chancellor, Kenny Doughty(n)

programme.desc: Jill Sprecher's film follows five New Yorkers whose lives intertwine, from eternal optimist Alan Arkin to his pessimistic colleague John Turturro, with Matthew McConaughey as a hot-shot lawyer whose life is derailed by a road accident(n)

programme.title: Boiler Room
programme.desc: In this drama that explores greed and corruption in American business, Giovanni Ribisi plays Seth Davis, an intelligent and ambitious college dropout who runs a casino in his apartment. Eager to show his father that he can succeed, Seth lands a job with a small stock brokerage firm. He is given a space in the company's "boiler room," where he makes cold calls to prospective clients. As it turns out, Seth has a genuine talent for cold calling, which gains him the approval of his superiors, the admiration of his father, and the attentions of one of his co-workers, Abby Hilliard (Nia Long). However, the higher up the ladder Seth rises, the deeper he sinks into a quagmire of dirty dealings, until he's breaking the law in order to keep his bosses happy and his paychecks coming. The Boiler Room also features Tom Everett Scott, Scott Caan, Jamie Kennedy, Nicky Katt, and Ben Affleck in a cameo as the headhunter who brings Seth into the firm. Ribisi and Scott also appeared together in That Thing You Do; Ribisi was the drummer replaced by Scott, who then led The One-Ders to fictional pop stardom(n)

programme.title: The Huntsman: Winter's War
programme.desc: This exhilarating spin-off of "Snow White and the Huntsman" acts as both prequel and sequel to the original film, detailing the adventures of Eric the Huntsman as he gets caught up in the rivalry between wicked queens Ravenna and Freya. During his quest, Eric is also endangered by his feelings for fellow warrior Sara, since ice queen Freya has decreed that love is forbidden in her kingdom(n)

programme.title: Slumdog Millionaire
programme.desc: Jamal Malik is one question away from winning 20 million rupees in the Indian version of the TV quiz show Who Wants to Be A Millionaire?. As he answers correctly one question after another, the producers suspect he is cheating and have him arrested. The police agents questioning him cannot believe that a slumdog like him can have the knowledge to win the prize and become a millionaire overnight. While trying to prove them it is destiny that placed him there, Jamal will take us back to the events of his childhood that have the clue to the answers. We will learn about how he and his little brother strived to survive in the mean streets of Mumbai and how he met Latika, his one true love. He entered the show knowing she would be watching it and now every question brings him closer to her(n)

programme.title: Real Time With Bill Maher
programme.desc: 08-04-2017. No additional information is available(n)

programme.title: Shakespeare in Love
programme.desc: One of the wittiest, most charming film comedies ever made, Shakespeare in Love is a brilliantly fictional story behind the creation of one of the most enduring pieces of literature ever written by the most acclaimed writer of all-time. Plagued with debt, writer's block, and fallen far past deadline for his latest play, it seems like things can't get much worse for young William Shakespeare (Joseph Fiennes). Then Will meets Viola, a young lady masquerading as man(n)

programme.title: Boiler Room
programme.desc: In this drama that explores greed and corruption in American business, Giovanni Ribisi plays Seth Davis, an intelligent and ambitious college dropout who runs a casino in his apartment. programme.title: The Birth of a Nation
programme.desc: This historical drama recounts a real-life slave revolt that occurred in 1831 Virginia, led by a black preacher named Nat Turner (Nate Parker). Turner is ordered by his master (Armie Hammer) to tour a number of local plantations, delivering sermons to the other slaves that will urge them against violence and any thoughts of rebellion. However, he is so appalled and sickened by the horrors he sees during his travels that he is eventually moved to fight back against the evils of slavery. Aja Naomi King and Gabrielle Union co-star. Parker wrote, directed, and stars in The Birth of a Nation, which won the Grand Jury Prize at the 2016 Sundance Film Festival(n)

programme.title: Hemingway & Gellhorn
programme.desc: A 1936 meeting between novelist Ernest Hemingway and war correspondent Martha Gellhorn sparks a nine-year relationship dominated by a volatile romance that nearly rivaled the combat zones into which they threw themselves in Spain, China, and World War II(n)

programme.title: Making of 'The Huntsman: Winter's War'
programme.desc: A look at "The Huntsman: Winter's War," a 2016 prequel to "Snow White and the Huntsman" that follows the Huntsman and his secret lover Sara as they attempt to stop Freya the Ice Queen and her evil sister from conquering the forest. The film stars Chris Hemsworth, Charlize Theron and Emily Blunt, and is directed by Cedric Nicolas-Troyan(n)

programme.title: Grumpier Old Men
programme.desc: Comedy sequel in which bickering curmudgeons Max and John find plenty more to disagree about - notably the marriage of their respective offspring and the arrival of a sexy Italian woman and her mother, who plan to turn the bait shop into a restaurant. Max and his bawdy old father put John's nose further out of joint by falling for the new arrivals(n)

programme.title: My Big Fat Greek Wedding
programme.desc: One woman's rocky road to the altar gets played for laughs in this comedy, adapted from the one-woman off-Broadway show written by and starring Nia Vardalos. Toula (Vardalos) is a Greek-American woman who is in her early thirties and single, with no immediate prospects of changing that status any time soon. This bothers Toula a bit, but not half as much as it distresses her mother (Lainie Kazan) and father (Michael Constantine), who want to send her to Greece in hopes of finding a husband in the old country. Toula isn't interested in leaving the country to find a man, but since she works in the family business -- a Greek restaurant in Chicago called Dancing Zorba's -- she has to hear about it whether she likes it or not. One day, after seeing a handsome stranger in the restaurant and not having the courage to talk to him, Toula decides she needs a bit of self-improvement. Despite her dad's misgivings, Toula signs up for a night-school class studying computers, trades in her glasses for contact lenses, gets a different job at a travel agency, and spruces herself up with a new look and a new attitude. To her very pleasant surprise, she once again encounters the handsome stranger, who soon asks her out on a date. Schoolteacher Ian Miller (John Corbett) is seemingly perfect -- he's tall, handsome, smart, good-natured, and soon in love with Toula -- except for two little things: he's not Greek, and he's a vegetarian, both of which horrify Toula's family. When Ian pops the question (and Toula says yes), the bride-to-be has to negotiate a reasonably peaceful meeting between Ian's upper-class parents and her own working-class extended family. There's also the matter of the wedding, which Toula's mother is planning around the notion that quantity IS quality. My Big Fat Greek Wedding also features Ian Gomez (Vardalos' real-life husband), Louis Mandylor, Andrea Martin, and Joey Fatone (from the pop group *NSYNC). Tom Hanks and Rita Wilson helped produce the film through the auspices of their production company, Playtone(n)

programme.title: Tin Cup
programme.desc: Romantic sports comedy about a washed-up golfer who tries to get back into the big game, having previously ruined his career when he was disqualified. Now making ends meet as a teacher at a shabby Texas driving range, his life is changed when he falls for a beautiful psychologist. He decides that the way to win her is to impress her - by beating her pro-golfer boyfriend and winning the US Open(n)

programme.title: Fast Times at Ridgemont High
programme.desc: A study of adolescent obsession with sex, drugs, and rock and roll has a girl seeking romance advice from an upperclassman on how to get a boy to notice her; and a stoner feuding with a teacher(n)

programme.title: Batman v Superman: Dawn of Justice
programme.desc: Batman and Superman clash over differing philosophies about what kind of heroism is needed to protect the world, while the public they're defending is becoming increasingly mindful of the damage that superheroes and masked vigilantes cause. However, the duo are soon forced to confront an even greater threat created by nefarious billionaire Lex Luthor(n)

programme.title: The Blair Witch Project
programme.desc: Three student filmmakers are terrorized in the Maryland forest while making a documentary about a legendary 18th-century witch. Heather Donahue, Joshua Leonard and Michael Williams star. Directed by Eduardo Sanchez and Daniel Myrick(n)

programme.title: Game of Thrones
programme.desc: The Spoils of War. No additional information is available(n)

programme.title: Straight Outta Compton
programme.desc: Entrenched in the racial tumult of Los Angeles in the mid-1980's, a group of aspiring rappers banded together to revolutionize the global consumption of hip-hop and popular culture. NWA was born out of racial frustration and the disadvantaged economics of their South Central neighborhood. F. Gary Gray directs this biopic about the rise to stardom for the act that earned the moniker of "The World's Most Dangerous Group", featuring Ice Cube's son O'Shea Jackson Jr. playing the role of his father, Corey Hawkins as Dr. Dre, and Jason Mitchell as the late Eazy-E(n)

programme.title: Room 104
programme.desc: Pizza Boy. A pizza delivery boy gets caught up in a couple's twisted games(n)

programme.title: About a Boy
programme.desc: London's most frequently eligible bachelor gets some lessons in growing up from a maladroit 12-year-old boy in this third big-screen adaptation of a Nick Hornby novel, directed and co-written by siblings Chris and Paul Weitz of American Pie fame. About a Boy concerns the parallel coming-of-age stories of the thirtysomething Will (Hugh Grant), a layabout "serial nice guy" living a posh, carefree lifestyle off his deceased father's fortune; and the preteen Marcus (Nicholas Hoult), a bright but awkward youth who's tired of his mom Fiona's (Toni Collette) depressed, boyfriend-less state. Their paths collide when Will, deciding that single mothers are the easiest romantic conquests on the dating scene, fabricates a two-year-old son and joins a group called S.P.A.T. (Single Parents Alone Together). Marcus is wise to Will's scheme, however, and through some incessant pestering and blackmail, he contrives for Will to date Fiona. Though Will doesn't hit it off immediately with either Marcus or his mother, he gradually begins to open up to the people around him -- so much so that he attracts the attention of another attractive single mom (Rachel Weisz). A U.S./U.K. co-production of Robert DeNiro's Tribeca Films and Tim Bevan and Eric Fellner's Working Title (the company responsible for the Grant-related Four Weddings and a Funeral and Bridget Jones's Diary), About a Boy was co-written by What's Eating Gilbert Grape creator Peter Hedges(n)

programme.title: Modern Marvels
programme.desc: Mad Electricity. By any standard, the Serbian-born scientist-cum-inventor Nikola Tesla (1856-1943) was a man with a vision light years ahead of its time. It may stun modern man, for instance, to learn that Tesla conceived of wireless energy, green power and remote controls decades before any of those concepts became en vogue. As a result of his prescience, Tesla made an enduring impact on contemporary technology, and many of his concepts were still being widely used at the dawn of the 21st Century. As produced by - and originally aired on - The History Channel, the episode of the series Modern Marvels entitled "Mad Electricity" travels inside of Tesla's brilliant mind to examine some of his many discoveries and patents and provide a brief window into his dazzling thought processes. Subtopics include: the now-global standard of alternating electrical current (AC), first employed by Tesla at Niagara Falls in 1893; a site on Long Island sound where Tesla constructed an enormous tower that he hoped would wirelessly power the entire world; Tesla's early advances with solar and geothermal power; and much more. The program draws on interviews with historians, demonstrations of Tesla's inventions, and much more(n)

programme.title: Borat
programme.desc: Master of disguise Sacha Baron Cohen hits the road to explore America as the crude Kazakstani reporter Borat in a feature mockumentary that brings one of the Da Ali G Show star's most popular characters to life on the big screen. Sent by the Kazakh Ministry of Information to gain a better understanding of American culture and bring his findings back home, Borat and faithful producer Azamat (Ken Davitian) set their sights in New York City. When the citizens and interview subjects of the Big Apple seem less than receptive to Borat's distinctively unrestrained approach and the curious Kazakh television personality stumbles across an episode of Baywatch while channel-surfing in his hotel room, he becomes instantly smitten with screen siren Pamela Anderson. Now confident that the only way to discover the true essence of America is to travel to California and make the bikini-clad beauty his bride, Borat purchases a ramshackle ice-cream truck in which he and Azamat will make their way across the Great Plains and on to the sunny West Coast -- all the while coming into contact with a wide variety of "typical" Americans. Within this loose, scripted framework, Borat engages in his usual misbehavior with unsuspecting strangers, from accidentally releasing a chicken from his suitcase on a New York subway ride to a formal interview with Alan Keyes(n)

programme.desc: Outlaw 'Snake' Plissken is blackmailed into infiltrating a prison island to restore LA's energy source and take out the girl who has stolen it: the President's daughter. The deal is fiendish: Plissken is infected with a virus and must return within a few hours before it kills him. The daughter of the US President has disappeared into the now-deadly Los Angeles with the crucial black box. Now the President's henchman Malloy demands that Snake go and find her, take the box and then kill her - and Snake can hardly refuse since the penalty for non-cooperation will be death!(n)

programme.title: Tipping Point
programme.desc: Game show, hosted by Ben Shephard, in which contestants answer questions to win turns on an arcade-style machine. Dropping tokens down a choice of four chutes, they hope to knock piles of them off a moving shelf - and the more they collect, the greater the prize fund. The player who has won the least amount is then eliminated, and the last one standing competes for a £10,000 jackpot.(n)

programme.title: Cash Trapped
programme.desc: Quiz hosted by Bradley Walsh in which six contestants battle it out across a series of fast-paced question rounds where the players must actively try to sabotage their opponents by beating them to the buzzer and trapping them out of the game. In the final round of each episode, the person who has earned the most cash will go head to head against the rest of the group to try to take their winnings home.(n)

programme.title: Emmerdale
programme.desc: Robert makes himself comfortable at Home Farm - but when he hears that Lawrence has discharged himself from hospital, he is forced to come up with a plan in a hurry. Ross has his doubts, and Pete struggles to stay calm.(n)

programme.desc: Robert is convinced Rich is behind Michelle's disappearance, while a hungover Leanne needs to talk to Steve about his marriage proposal. Elsewhere, Gary heads off to his new job and Sarah warns him to be careful as he's had a few drinks.(n)

programme.title: Countrywise
programme.desc: Ben Fogle tries his hand at free diving in Cornwall and Liz Bonnin works with a team of volunteers at Cuan Wildlife Rescue centre in Shropshire caring for injured birds. programme.title: Coronation Street
programme.desc: Robert grabs Rich outside his house and gives him a severe beating, leading to an arrest, while Gary is rushed to hospital after suffering an accident at work. Elsewhere, Amy texts Simon informing him that Leanne and Steve are going to get married.(n)

programme.title: UEFA Super Cup Highlights
programme.desc: Real Madrid v Manchester United. Jacqui Oatley presents action from the match between the winners of the Champions League and Europa League, which took place at Philip II Arena in Skopje, Macedonia. Madrid won their 12th European Cup with victory over Juventus in Cardiff in June, while United overcame Ajax in Stockholm to win the Europa League - formerly known as the UEFA Cup - for the first time. With analysis from Glenn Hoddle and Lee Dixon, and commentary by Clive Tyldesley.(n)

Anna becomes increasingly worried about depressed widower Ted, and following a hunch, heads to the factory to find him perched on the roof - ready to jump. Dick and Oscar are surprised by Cheryl's return and a heartfelt confession provides an important breakthrough in their bid to be happily united.(n)

programme.desc: Bafta-winning drama based on a true story, written by and starring Victoria Wood. Downtrodden wife and mother Nella's life takes an unexpected turn for the better after she joins the Women's Voluntary Service office in Barrow-in-Furness during the Second World War. However, her new-found happiness is shattered when her son Cliff leaves to join the troops - provoking a painful confrontation with husband Will. David Threlfall and Stephanie Cole co-star.(n)

programme.desc: When Dr Alan Delaney is killed by a hit-and-run driver while in charge of his partner's new car, Barnaby and Jones discover the dead man had once been accused by Dr James Kirkwood of stealing a large sum of money from their Midsomer Market practice. Further investigations to uncover the whereabouts of the missing money lead the detectives to believe that Kirkwood may have been the real target. Guest starring Stephanie Cole (Doc Martin), with John Nettles and Jason Hughes.(n)

programme.desc: While investigating the murder of prison officer Charlie Tyner, Brooks and Devlin discover he had been abusing his position and convicts in his charge. Starring Bradley Walsh, Jamie Bamber, Ben Daniels and Freema Agyeman.(n)

programme.desc: Bob Hoskins stars in the return of Jimmy McGovern's interlinked drama anthology. He plays pub landlord Paddy Gargan, who finds himself on the wrong side of a local gangster after barring the man's son from the pub for smoking in the toilets. With neither man willing to back down, the disagreement becomes a matter of mutual pride and self-respect - and violence seems inevitable. Also starring Liam Cunningham, Frances Barber and Timothy Spall.(n)

programme.desc: A piano teacher (guest star George Costigan) remains suspiciously secretive about his past when brought in to casualty after collapsing outside the hospital. Elsewhere, Jill delivers bad news to an elderly patient and the porters are forced to take industrial action in support of a colleague.(n)

programme.sub-title: The Darling Buds of May - Part Two.
programme.desc: Part two of two. Light-hearted drama based on the novels by HE Bates, starring David Jason, Pam Ferris, Philip Franks and Catherine Zeta-Jones.(n)

programme.title: You're Only Young Twice
programme.desc: Flora decides to throw an anniversary dinner party for her late lamented greengrocer husband and takes over the catering arrangements, resulting in a very unusual gourmet offering.(n)

programme.title: On the Buses
programme.desc: Suzy gives Stan food from the canteen to take home - but it's stolen property. Vintage comedy, starring Reg Varney.(n)

programme.title: Rising Damp
programme.desc: Lonely landlord Rigsby decides he needs help to improve his ailing love life and turns to new tenant Philip for advice. Classic comedy, starring Leonard Rossiter, Richard Beckinsale and Don Warrington.(n)

programme.title: Murder, She Wrote
programme.desc: Jessica Fletcher tackles a mystery involving a diamond, a dog and an old grudge while on holiday at a friend's lodge in the Grand Teton mountains. A surly visitor who threatened to reveal some scandalous information about her friend is found dead. Angela Lansbury stars.(n)

programme.title: Heathrow: Britain's Busiest Airport
programme.desc: Behind the scenes at the airport. Heavy fog throws Heathrow into turmoil and new terminal manager Callum is faced with hundreds of angry and stranded passengers stuck overnight at the airport, while visibility has dropped to less than 100m on the airfield and safety officer Chris is forced to marshal planes. Manager Nilam reveals the secrets of one of Heathrow's most exclusive first-class lounges and dispatcher James and his team hunt around the terminal for late passengers for a flight to Pakistan.(n)

programme.title: Paul O'Grady's Animal Orphans
programme.desc: The comedian begins another tour of Zambia, Namibia and South Africa helping to hand-rear orphaned animals and prepare them for release back into their natural habitats. His first stop is the Moholoholo Wildlife Rehabilitation Centre, where he meets an eight-month-old rhino which lost its mother when she was killed by poachers. Next, he teaches a young aardvark how to hunt for termites, before providing some much-needed company for a lion cub which was raised as a pet until she got too big to handle.(n)

programme.title: Law & Order: UK
programme.desc: The withdrawal of a library book on the day of his death is the only clue to a student's murder. Two people who can be linked to the book give each other an alibi, and the police have their work cut out to identify who is lying. The killer eventually confesses and claims self-defence, forcing Phillips to face up to past demons, while Steel finds himself not only prosecuting the offender but also defending the victim. Freema Agyeman and Ben Daniels star.(n)

programme.title: Lewis
programme.desc: The detective discovers his favourite 1970s band are on the verge of a comeback - along with their singer Esme Ford, who has made a shocking reappearance from beyond the grave, having faked her own death 35 years earlier. But when an orphan is found dead on the other side of town, a forensic link leads Lewis and Hathaway to suspect the aged rockers are somehow involved. Joanna Lumley, David Hayman, Simon Callow and Helen Baxendale guest star alongside Kevin Whately and Laurence Fox.(n)

programme.title: Rambo: First Blood Part II
programme.desc: Incarcerated Special Forces veteran John Rambo is offered the chance for freedom by former commander Colonel Trautman if he takes up the offer to return to the jungles of Vietnam on a life-or-death mission to rescue American PoWs. During the course of the operation, he develops strong feelings for his guide, a female freedom fighter - but tragedy strikes, leaving him more determined than ever to exact a bloody and explosive revenge. Action adventure sequel, starring Sylvester Stallone, Richard Crenna, Julia Nickson-Soul, Steven Berkoff, George Kee Cheung, Andy Wood and Martin Kove.(n)

programme.desc: A man falsely convicted of murder is released from prison, only to stumble into a gangland shoot out. programme.title: Island at War
programme.desc: Walker discovers Zelda's secret and attempts to blackmail her, forcing her into hiding, while Angelique fears Bernhardt has been killed when the British shoot down a number of German planes. James takes Eugene's parents to the site of their son's execution, but Von Rheingarten throws them off the property before befriending Philip, whom he still believes to be a local gardener.(n)

programme.title: Kavanagh QC
programme.desc: The old poem about the boy standing on the burning deck takes on new meaning as Kavanagh defends two Navy officers accused of arson, and finds he cannot use his only defence. It is a tough case, and the last thing he needs is extra stress at home - but that does not stop the children planning an anniversary party without telling him. With Andy Serkis, Ray Winstone and Geraldine James.(n)

programme.title: Upstairs, Downstairs
programme.desc: Lady Prudence and Hazel disagree about a tea-party for wounded officers due to be held at Eaton Place. Rose has an unexpected reunion with a farmer from Australia who she almost married before the war.(n)

programme.title: Always and Everyone
programme.desc: An unusually busy night proves too much for the A&E staff, driving a stressed-out Robert to lose his cool as the ward descends into chaos. The death of an elderly patient left unsupervised in a corridor and a violent confrontation involving her son brings matters to a head - and to add to Robert's woes, an aggrieved Christine questions his motives in offering her the consultancy. Meanwhile, Cathy can't believe her ears when Mike makes a stunning announcement. Hospital drama, starring Martin Shaw, Niamh Cusack, David Harewood and Jane Slavin.(n)

programme.title: Heartbeat
programme.desc: There is trouble in the village when local children get their hands on some wartime ammunition, while Greengrass locks horns with Lord Ashfordly's new gamekeeper and Kate realises she is pregnant.(n)

programme.title: Island at War
programme.desc: James confesses to the La Salles that he was responsible for Eugene's death and Sheldon discovers Zelda's hiding place in Cassie's shop, and urges her to flee the island. Philip is determined to get back to England and hatches an escape plan with the help of Wilf and James, but the day ends in disaster when the three men are arrested and sent to a prison in France.(n)

programme.title: Kavanagh QC
programme.desc: A policewoman is murdered, and when a blood-soaked shoe is found in a suspect's wardrobe, it seems to be an open-and-shut case - but Kavanagh is not convinced the right man is in the dock. John Thaw stars.(n)

programme.title: Heartbeat
programme.desc: Nick and Kate receive plenty of advice from the locals when their marriage runs into trouble and Greengrass becomes the main suspect for lead theft.(n)

programme.title: Upstairs, Downstairs
programme.sub-title: If You Were the Only Girl in the World.
programme.desc: Hazel scandalises Lady Prudence by staying out all night with an airman she met at the tea party.(n)

programme.title: Always and Everyone
programme.desc: Jack congratulates himself on having got the better of Robert in the run-up to the risk-management inquiry, but just when everything seems to be going his way, he goes and causes a road accident . To make matters worse, he's been banned from driving, and shouldn't have been behind the wheel of a car in the first place, which understandably makes it hard for him to keep his mind on his job. Worried and distracted, he makes a grave error of judgement, and suddenly finds himself struggling to cover his tracks. Meanwhile, Sam finds herself on the receiving end of Christine's wrath over a malicious rumour. Medical drama, starring Martin Shaw and Niamh Cusack, with a guest appearance by Jane Danson's real-life partner Robert Beck.(n)

programme.title: Agatha Christie's Poirot
programme.desc: The detective sets out for Norfolk when a country publican begs him to help solve a murder - but is disappointed when the innkeeper turns out to be a budding author and the killing fictional. However, he soon has food for thought when a real death occurs - committed by a seemingly ghostly hand. Geraldine Alexander and Ian McCulloch guest star, with David Suchet.(n)

programme.title: Agatha Christie's Poirot
programme.desc: Beautiful Russian aristocrat Countess Vera Rossakoff, the chief suspect in a series of jewel thefts, seemingly captivates Poirot with her charm and intellect, meaning Hastings and Miss Lemon have to do most of the actual detective work and ensure she is brought to justice. Drama, guest starring Kika Markham.(n)

programme.title: Grantchester
programme.desc: The return of the detective drama set in the 1950s, starring James Norton and Robson Green. Sidney receives a series of anonymous phone calls, which he realises may be linked to a series of murders in which the victims were all important community figures killed by someone who leaves dead birds as a grisly calling card. The threat forces Sidney to question whether he can reconcile his relationship with Amanda and his calling as a vicar. Leonard bonds with Hilary as she cares for her dying father, while Geordie's investigation of the killings leads him to a mysterious home for people with disabilities.(n)

programme.title: The Americans
programme.desc: Philip and Elizabeth are thrown when things with Tuan take an unexpected turn, Henry makes a startling proposition and Stan has a disturbing encounter with Frank Gaad's widow.(n)

programme.title: Prime Suspect 1973
programme.desc: The police officers are numb after the explosion, and as they search the rubble, they make a horrifying realisation. The Bentleys make one last stand as a manhunt is launched for Clifford and David, while a distraught Renee is put under arrest. Before long Tennison makes one final discovery about Julie Ann's murder - but as she gets closer to solving the case, she finds herself in mortal danger. Stefanie Martini stars as the novice WPC who would eventually become the tough senior detective made famous by Helen Mirren. Last in the series.(n)

programme.title: Vera
programme.desc: Following the suicide of Jeanie Long, the woman convicted of the murder of teenager Abigail Mantel 11 years earlier, new evidence comes to light exonerating her. DCI Vera Stanhope reinvestigates the case, but to find out who really killed Abigail, the detective must uncover the secrets of a close-knit community that is still coming to terms with the incident. Detective drama, adapted from Ann Cleeves' novel Telling Tales, guest starring Hugo Speer alongside Brenda Blethyn, David Leon, Wunmi Mosaku and Paul Ritter.(n)

programme.title: Arthur & George
programme.desc: Martin Clunes plays celebrated novelist and physician Arthur Conan Doyle in this adaptation of Julian Barnes' novel. The drama is based on real events in the Sherlock Holmes creator's life, as he pursues a notorious miscarriage of justice. It's 1906, and Sir Arthur and his trusted secretary Alfred `Woodie' Wood investigate the case of George Edalji, a young Anglo-Indian solicitor who was imprisoned for allegedly mutilating animals and writing obscene letters. With Charles Edwards, Arsher Ali, Art Malik, Emma Fielding, Hattie Morahan, Conleth Hill and Sandra Voe.(n)

programme.title: Crime Stories
programme.desc: Pensioner Margaret Jones accuses her dry-cleaner Sam of stealing her winning lottery ticket after he begins driving around in a new car. The investigation leads the detectives to a travel agent where her husband recently bought a cruise, but the case seems solved when they discover it was Sam who cashed in the winnings.(n)

programme.desc: Robert's interview with the management consultants doesn't go as planned when it ends up as a painful self-analysis of his ability as a doctor, but although his skills on the wards and in the operating theatre prove otherwise, it's enough to make the beleaguered doc hand in his resignation. Arch-enemy Jack is over the moon about the turn of events and reckons his day couldn't get any better, blissfully unaware that Christine has got her hands on a copy of an X-ray that proves his own shortcomings. programme.title: Heartbeat
programme.desc: Emily finds out she is pregnant, but the joy is tempered by ill-feeling from the Jacobs family over the death of their father, who was run over by a tractor. Meanwhile, Kate enjoys peculiar cravings. Sixties-based drama, starring Nick Berry.(n)

programme.title: Upstairs, Downstairs
programme.desc: Rose receives tragic news about Gregory Wilmott, while Hazel has to deal with Jack's death and husband James's return from the front.(n)
